movie101_6965768652251628068_1140_1320.text: Xia Luo, who was about to leave, was stopped by Ma Dongmei. Xia Luo looked at Ma Dongmei, then at the window, and said, 'Mom, I'll burn some extra paper for you later.'
Xia Luo, who was hanging outside the window, fell down.
Ma Dongmei, with a popsicle in hand, sat on the ground, looking around. Suddenly, the lights in the room went out.
Xia Luo slowly opened his eyes and said: "Wife, I dreamt of my mom."
Xia Luo's father said: "Son, who are you calling your wife?"
Xia Luo weakly called out: "Mom"
Xia Luo's Mom said: 'You scared your Mom to death, can't believe you are still alive, can you?'
Xia Luo's Mom said, 'I can't believe you are still alive.'
Xia Luo's mother, seeing this, quickly stepped forward to comfort him. Doctor said: "From the current situation, there shouldn't be any major issues."

Doctor said: "Maybe you should consider transferring hospitals."
Mom said: "Son, what's wrong, Xia Luo?"
Xia Luo was discharged from the hospital, wearing a neck brace and limping. He staggered out of the hospital, looking around. A group of kids were playing in the street, and Xia Luo joined in.
The scene shifts to the street, where Xia Luo is wearing a neck brace and looking around. The street is bustling with people, and the streets are adorned with red banners.
Xia Luo's mind was flooded with memories of his childhood, where he was bullied by classmates, and his mother was always there to protect him.

The scene shifts to the bustling streets of the city, with cars coming and going. Xia Luo is seen riding a bicycle, weaving through the traffic. The camera slowly zooms out, and the city's buildings become smaller and smaller until they disappear into the distance.
Mom said: "If something happens to Xia Luo, I just can't go on living. Honestly, Xia Luo has been fatherless since he was little. Right after Xia Luo was born, Xia Luo's father disappeared."
Ma Dongmei said: "Auntie, I can especially understand you. Our family is in the same situation. My father is Ma Dong; as soon as I was born, my father was gone, so they call me, Ma Dongmei."
At this moment, Xia Luo suddenly appeared at the door, looking at the scene inside with a face full of horror.
The scene shifts to the campus, where students are dispersing after class. Xia Luo and Ma Dongmei are running frantically, with Ma Dongmei in the lead.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.text: The next day, the school's announcement system blared, and Da Chun was still sulking in the corner. Zhang Yang and Meng Te sat on the steps, watching Da Chun and said, "Xia Luo is pretty badass, daring to hit a teacher."

Jia Fu Lian said: "So the painting really exists."
Jia Fu Lian said: "I thought it was burned up."
Jia Fu Lian said: "In the year 1860, my great-great-grandfather sailed on the Not-fire to China," "fought a victorious battle," "this is one of the spoils he brought back."
Jia Fu Lian said: "You must mean the looting of the Old Summer Palace, it happened during the Second Opium War, remember?"
Jia Fu Lian said: "That depends on one's perspective."
JC said: "Ah, she's right, the corrupt Qing government executed diplomats from Britain and France, which became an excuse for the war."
Jia Fu Lian said: "Are those the reasons for two industrial nations to join forces to invade an agricultural nation?"

movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.text: Coco said: "In the eyes of those industrial countries, China is indeed a strong country."
The man said: "Yeah, back then our Qing government considered itself as the Celestial Empire."
The young man asked, 'Are you helping me or her?'
The young master said, 'Of course, I'm helping you. And then?'
The man asked in confusion: "What?"
The leader asked, "And then what?"
The woman said, "On the way back, they encountered a storm. The ship was destroyed."
Coco said, "The stolen items were too many and too heavy. This is retribution."
The woman asked, 'What did she say? Can you speak English?'
Coco said, 'I don't speak English.'
Coco said: "I didn't say that was unfortunate, I said he deserved it."
The woman said, 'He deserved it? That's too heartless. He went to China on a national mission. It was his duty as a soldier. Fortunately, he was saved by a passing Chinese merchant ship.'
Coco said: 'Heaven really didn't open its eyes back then.'
Coco said, "What are you saying?"
Coco said: "She said thank heaven he came back."
Lao Lu said: "Clearly, that wasn't what she said. But I still appreciate it."
Coco said, "You're welcome."
Coco said, "What are you doing?"
Coco said, 'I'm taking it back to China.'
The young man said: "This is my home, you cannot take things at will."
Coco said, "Just like over a hundred years ago, your ancestors took this painting without asking."
Coco said: "Coco, ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh, Coco, well, well, that was a long time ago. Just like back then if a woman wore little, someone might throw stones at her. Not at you, at her. Sorry."
Coco said, 'What are you apologizing for? Don't be a doormat. The ones who should apologize are them—'
Coco asked, "Did she say anything?"

Coco said, 'I don't need you to translate for me. Have you all forgotten? Over a hundred years ago in our country, they burned, killed, and looted. Just over a century ago, you came to our country to plunder and kill. Even a hundred years later, these are painful memories for the Chinese people.'

The woman said: "That's right. I've studied history, and no matter how you interpret it, those events did happen. Sometimes we can only justify it with unreasonable reasons, like in those days, the strong were always right."
Coco said, 'We can't judge past mistakes by today's standards. Even now, the strong rule. You need to be strong enough for others to reason with you.'
Coco said, "Alright, I begin to understand her thoughts. Sorry. In the end, these things all belong to the bank now. They are of no value to me. If I could, I would give them to you."

Luo Ge said: "It's a minor issue. Rest assured, I'll handle it quickly."
The scene shifts to the entrance of the funeral home, where a group of people are walking out. At the forefront is the man in the floral shirt, followed by the others.

The scene shifts to the street, where a group of people are walking in an orderly fashion. At the front of the group is a man in a suit, followed by a man in a shirt and vest, and at the very front is a man in a vest and trousers.
The scene shifts to the entrance of the Kowloon Funeral Home, where a group of people are gathered. Xiao Di said, "Boss, it's Yan Tong's birthday today. Doesn't this big scene scare you?"
Big Gray Bear said: "I want him to know that when I Big Gray Bear get angry, no one can handle it."
Big Gray Bear, seeing this, angrily said: "Gong Zai Keung, you scoundrel, isn't your Kowloon business enough? Why did you come to steal my Hong Kong business? Yan Tong doesn't care. I will."
A man in the crowd said: "Wrong side."

The scene shifts to the prison, where Man in Short Sleeves is shouting: "You've been secretly stealing my business in Kwun Tong and Tsz Wan Shan. You play tricks?" "I'll play big with you. I've already ordered the coffin, Big Gray Bear."
Man in Short Sleeves said, "We're not here to fight. Why so much pointless talk?"
A man said: "In the underworld, the biggest fist gets the biggest share." Another man said: "Brother Hao, aren't we just here to make up the numbers?"
Man in Short Sleeves said: "This time it's serious."
The man in black said: "The rules will be set by me from now on."
The crowd shouted in unison: "Good!"
A man said: "Get the weapons."
Gong Zai Keung said: "Screw you, you set the rules?" "Set what rules? You don't even need to order a coffin." "I'll cut you into pieces and feed you to the dogs."
The man in the green shirt said: "If you want to fight, let me finish my coffee first."
Big Gray Bear said: "Chop him up for me."
Xiao Di shouted: "Brothers, attack! Come on!"
The crowd shouted: "Chop him up for me."
Yan Tong said to <Luo Ge0>: "<Luo Ge0>, your two good brothers are staging a big scene downstairs. Aren't you getting involved?"
Luo Ge said, "Yan Tong, stop messing around. You know I faint at the sight of blood."
The two of them were surrounded by the crowd, and the people around them were holding sticks and axes, ready to attack at any time. The two of them were in a difficult situation, with no way out.
The scene shifts to the street, where the crowd is in chaos. Yan Tong and Ge Bo are watching from upstairs, and Yan Tong says, "It's too bloody, not as fun as gambling."

A Ping said: 'If you sell, I'll use; if I don't sell, I won't use!'
A Ping said: "Listen to big sister-in-law."
A Ping said: 'You're not my sister-in-law. My real sister-in-law is dead.'
A Qi said: 'What are you saying, huh? You little brat, what?'
Xiao Wei said: "Don't do it, don't, Ah Ping, quick, leave, leave!"
A Qi said: "You little brat, give him to me and lock him upstairs until he kicks the habit before you let him out!"

movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.text: Da Wei said: "Spread the word, if anyone dares to sell cocaine to my younger brother again, they will lose their hands and feet. Also, if I find out you're the one supplying him, we can no longer consider ourselves brothers."
The two brothers replied, "Understood, understood." The three of them then left the room. A Hao sat on the sofa, took out a bottle of alcohol, and started drinking.
Qiong Jie quickly stepped forward to comfort him, saying, "Calm down, calm down."
Piggy said, "Brother Luo, bad news."
Piggy asked, "What happened?"
Piggy said, "We've got trouble. General Songchai from Golden Triangle just died from a stroke. The one taking over is named Naimi."

A Hao took out a wad of cash from his pocket and handed it to Lei Luo. Lei Luo took the money, looked at it, and then stuffed it into his pocket. He took out a cigarette and lit it for A Hao.

A Hao looked at Lei Luo with a face full of grievance, but Lei Luo just smiled and said nothing.

Chai Jia said: "Hao Ge, things have been a mess in the Golden Triangle since General Songchai died. That General Naimi is a difficult man to deal with, he's driven away all the fixers, I can't get near him now, give me some time. Both Ah Rong and Ah Chao came to visit me early in the morning. I told them to go die."

movie101_6973286990817002015_4740_4920.text: Chai Jia said: "Zao’er, Tianhua, Rong, and Achao all came looking for trouble with me, I told them to drop dead. I only work for your A Hao family, let's not talk about this for now, let's relax tonight and take a bath first."

movie101_6973286990817002015_5100_5280.text: A Hao said: "I brought some medicine for your army today, and also some top-quality Cuban cigars for you!"

A Hao said: "Please take a seat." A Hao pulled out a chair for General Naimi, who sat down and said: "I'm starving."
General Naimi said: "A Hao, I heard you've come from afar. If you need my goods, name your price."
A Hao said: "General, you're straightforward and to the point. General Somsak used to charge me 3,500 per kilogram. I'll add 400 for you, 3,900. That's it."
A Hao said: "3,900? Someone here has already offered 6,000 per kilogram." General Naimi said: "6,000? This market can't take it! Impossible!"
General Naimi said: "A Hao, it's no use talking now. They have already come to the door with a deposit."
Rose placed the box on the table, and A Hao, with a gun in hand, walked over to the table. He glanced at the box, then at Rose, and then sat down opposite General Naimi.
A Hao placed the box on the table, and General Naimi, with a cigar in his mouth, slowly opened it. Inside was a large amount of cash.

A Hao said: "Hua Zi Rong, you're the one who offered 6,000? You really deserve to die! Do you have so much money to give away? This treacherous dog, selling me out today, will sell you out tomorrow. You shouldn't do business with these people. I, A Hao, am trustworthy. I guarantee that if you cooperate with me, you will be satisfied, General."

A Hao, with a fierce look, stood up and walked towards the two drug dealers. The drug dealers, seeing this, immediately drew their guns and shot at A Hao. A Hao, hit in the leg, fell to the ground, and the drug dealers took the opportunity to flee.
General Naimi said: "So you're playing behind my back, huh? You think you're in Hong Kong? This is Thailand! You can go to hell if you want to bargain with me!"
The scene shifts to a radio station, where a female voice is heard: "Daddy, lots of brothers took me and mommy to ride the carousel. When are you coming to play?"
The fat man, seeing this, quickly took out a photo from his pocket and handed it to General Naimi.
A Hao, with a cigar in his mouth, walked towards the crowd, his face expressionless. He took a deep drag of the cigar, exhaled a puff of smoke, and then slowly walked towards the crowd.

A Qi and Piggy followed behind A Hao. A Hao walked into the ward and saw Qing Jie. He walked over and said, "Bro A Hao."

Qing Jie asked, "What did the doctor say?"
Qing Jie said, "The doctor said, his brain has been severely hit. He might become a vegetative. Even if he wakes up, his intelligence will be affected."
A Hao, with a face full of worry, stood up and said, "I'm going to find a doctor."
A Hao said: "I told this damned kid not to touch that thing, told him not touch."

Lei Luo said: "You can't kill a cop," "Even in Britain," "If you fight with the British, we can't win."

A Hao said excitedly: "Why can't we fight them?" "Right now, all the goods in Hong Kong are in my hands," "All the police in Hong Kong are fed by me," "As long as I give the word," "Even burning down the police headquarters is possible."
A Qi and Da Wei were trying to calm A Hao down, saying: "Cool down, cool down, just cool down."

Lei Luo said: "I won't kill the police."

movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.text: Piggy said: "What you feared the most is finally happening."

The scene shifts to the newsroom, where the news is reporting: "Here is a special news report. Governor Sir Murray MacLehose has announced the establishment of the Independent Commission Against Corruption (ICAC) to specifically combat bribery and corruption in both public and private sectors. Sir Jack Cater has been appointed as Commissioner of the ICAC. A large number of personnel have been recruited to join the ICAC, and a statement was made that no personnel will be seconded from the civil service. This concludes the special news report."

The female officer said: "Independent Commission Against Corruption (ICAC)"
Lei Luo said: "So what? We just give them a bigger share." Piggy said: "Dad, I don't think so. I feel like they are serious this time."
Sir Chow said: "I don't believe they can deal with all the corrupt cops in Hong Kong. Who would manage the city's security then? Leave it to the gangs?"
Ge Bo said: "Of course. I will fly to Spain tomorrow. Let's see if they can catch me and bring me back."
Sir Chow said: "Those British, nine out of ten are corrupt."
Piggy asked: "Are you the exclusive rent collector for Inspector Lei Luo?"
Piggy said: "What rent collector? I am the landlord."

During this time, Mr. Jiang Feng, you may also want to think it over. If you really decide to undergo the surgery, please let us know in advance."

The laser array on the top of the robot was activated, and the robot moved forward slowly. The laser array was aimed at the center of the platform, and the robot extended its arm, emitting a purple light from its fingertip, which turned into a high-intensity blue light and cut through the platform.

The scene shifts to a ballroom, where Charlie is holding a glass of champagne, watching the dancing couples. He takes a sip of the champagne, then puts down the glass and looks at the dancing couples with a frown.

The bullet was instantly melted and deformed by the high temperature.

Xiao Bao: "Received"
The scene shifts to the monitoring room, where the monitor shows a group of people in a church. The man in the suit says, "Pierre, what's going on?"

movie101_7026623602615452196_900_1080.text: Xiao Bao, who was in the control room, saw the situation and immediately ran to the data room. He opened the floor panel and took out a data module. The people in the hall were in chaos, and the security was in a mess.

Pierre, who was holding a sign, was pushed to the ground by a bodyguard. He got up and continued to walk forward, but was pushed down again. He struggled and managed to break free, but was pushed back down by the bodyguard. He then ran into the kitchen.
Pierre took out his police badge and walked into the prison. The guard opened the door and said, "How is it possible when we never left?"
Pierre said, "Call your captain immediately."
Xiao Bao took out a phone from his pocket, pressed the screen, and the wall opened. He took out a box from the wall, closed the wall, and walked to the other side.
Xiao Bao searched through the filing cabinet, and after a thorough search, he finally found what he was looking for. He turned around and said, "Found it."
Zhang Dan, who was waiting outside the door, saw the reflection of the two in the mirror and walked over. He asked, "How much longer do we have to wait?"
Pierre: "Ye Hong, position"
Ye Hong said: "I am on my way, are you still inside?"
Zhang Dan said, "Still inside."
Xiao Bao took out a telescope from his bag and began to observe the room on the second floor.
Xiao Bao, who was hiding in the shadows, saw the security guards leave and immediately followed.
Zhang Dan said: "I am here."
Pierre said: "Open the safe immediately" "Someone is inside stealing the Wings of Dreams"
Zhang Dan said, "Impossible."
Pierre said, "Listen to me, this riot is just a smokescreen. Open the safe immediately."
Zhang Dan said, "You need to share your internal information with us."
Pierre said, "You're wasting time," "Open the safe."
The door opened, and the room was pitch black. Suddenly, a hole appeared in the floor, and the room was filled with dust. A figure with a flashlight appeared, moving forward cautiously.
Zhang Dan said: "Everyone, be alert," "Let's go."

Xiao Bao, who had just finished speaking, was about to leave when his phone suddenly rang. He took out his phone and saw a map displayed on the screen. He looked up and said, "Open the safe immediately."

Pierre and Xiao Bao ran to the elevator, and the doors slowly opened. The two of them ran into the elevator, and the doors slowly closed. The elevator was moving upwards, with the lights on in the shaft.
The scene shifts to the vault, where Xiao Bao is trying to break in. He presses the password button, but nothing happens. He then takes out a tool to pry open the password door.

Xiao Bao, who was still in the room, was holding a scanner, scanning the data on the wall. The scanner emitted a buzzing sound, and the data on the wall was being copied onto the scanner. At this moment, the door of the vault was opened, and Zhang Dan walked in.

Xiao Bao and the others arrived at the vault, and Xiao Bao started to input the password. The password was accepted, and the vault door slowly opened. Xiao Bao took out a data cable and inserted it into the vault. The data cable was successfully connected, and the vault door automatically closed.

movie101_7052960987330118151_1080_1260.text: Xiaoli Ma, who was originally in the room, heard the noise and walked out. She looked at the door and saw Lan Lan's figure. She walked to the door and looked outside.

Lan Lan was singing in the room, and Shen Mo was standing behind her, watching her. She was singing: "Why do the words turn away when they reach our lips?" "Your smile, like the crescent moon, sets a romantic mood, just needing your company."
Xiaoli Ma put on the apron, took out a kitchen knife from the drawer, and started chopping vegetables.

Qi Qi: 'A special thanks to MC Ninth Round for the gift of a little car. Actually, I don't really need a little car. I only need nine hundred and eight to bring it home. Kisses during the day, and at night...'
Xiaoli Ma shouted: "Dinner is ready!"
Xiaoli Ma said: "Hey, let me tell you, today I received over nine hundred roses, more than ten thousand likes, and over three thousand boxes of chocolates."
Qi Qi said: "Today I received over a thousand cakes, more than five hundred hearts, and even cash."
Qi Qi said: "Hey, let me tell you something first"
Xiaoli Ma said: "What's this, comparing stats with your sister? Come on, try the soup I've stewed for over ten thousand seconds."
Lan Lan said: "Sis, your cooking is so delicious. Why bother with drama school? Opening your own restaurant would be great."
Xiaoli Ma said: "It's okay."
Qi Qi said: "How about this sis," "next time you live stream," "wear my dress," "what do you think?"
Lan Lan looked at Qi Qi with a smile, then lowered her head and touched her own chest, saying, "Let's have some soup."
Qi Qi said: "Lan Lan, maybe I could learn from you, that thing with the eyelashes, curling..."
Lan Lan: "Eyelashes curl, eyes blinking wink, a world so thrilling, it's fun to play. Let's play blowing in the wind, blow what? Blow into love at first sight."
Xiaoli Ma, with a smile, touched her face and then started to type on the keyboard.

Qi Jia, who was sitting in the car, was also swept out by the flood. Yuan Xiaoou, who was also in the car, asked Qi Jia: 'Is there no other way?'
Lin Shuer angrily said: "You shameless jerk, didn't you say you were abroad?"
Lin Shuer's boyfriend said: 'I'm destined to travel the world. Don’t think you can ride the bull and act all mighty.'
Lin Shuer said: 'I am mighty, so what? If you're so capable, swim over here and bite me.'
Lin Shuer's boyfriend, holding an umbrella, said: "I haven't learned to swim all this time, didn't you know?" "Call the police to save me quickly."
Lin Shuer said: "I won't." "I won't save you or call the police." "Float wherever you want."
Lin Shuer's boyfriend, squatting in the rain, said: "You're too heartless. Let's break up."
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Fine, let's break up. Whoever doesn’t is a coward." Yuan Xiaoou, who was squatting on the car roof, was swept away by the rain.
Yuan Xiaoou, who was about to answer the phone, was interrupted by Qi Jia. Yuan Xiaoou said, 'The line is busy.'
Yuan Xiaoou, holding the phone, said, 'Come back quickly and save us. Water is already inside the car. Hurry, hurry, hurry.'
Qi Jia, with a gloomy face, said: "Yuan Xiaoou, we probably won't be able to escape, right?"
Qi Jia, with a smile, said, 'It's okay, it's okay, I’m still here. Don't worry.'
Qi Jia said: "Yuan Xiaoou, we are about to die, right?"
Qi Jia looked at the rain-soaked Yuan Xiaoou, then at the sky, and said: "If we have to die together, I think it's quite nice."
Qi Jia said: "Yuan Xiaoou, I've imagined ten thousand ways to die, but I never thought it would be like this, suffocating."

movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.text: Doctor said: "The age of menopausal patients is tending to decrease. This is called premature menopause. I'll prescribe you a 'Dingkun Dan.' Back in the day, Emperor Qianlong had three thousand concubines. It's thanks to this that they could regulate the liver, relieve depression, and maintain youth."

Qi Jia said: "You misdiagnosed." "Yeah, I'm not dizzy, you know, my head is perfectly fine; I'm not dizzy." "I'm not even married yet, and I haven't even had a child." "My mom hasn't even hit menopause." "Are you saying I'm experiencing premature menopause?" "Do you even have professional ethics?"
Doctor said: "Angry, aren't we? Feeling a bit dizzy, right? These are typical symptoms of menopause. Just like this cactus. Prickly on the outside, but the inside is still very soft."

The scene shifts, and Lin Shuer is lying on the lawn, looking at the sky. Lin Shuer says: "Soft my sister, prick your own head." The scene shifts again, and Qi Jia is lying on the lawn, looking at the sky.

Lin Shuer said: "Heard you hit menopause?" "I told you before, if you don't get your period for six months, it's a bad omen." "But when you seek medical advice, why would you prick the doctor's chin with a cactus?" "Why did you leave my phone number after you pricked them?" "Is that decent of you?" "Ah, let's go."
Lin Shuer asked: "Tell me, what do you want to do tonight?"
Lin Shuer, leaning on the car door, said: "The night grows late with snow threatening; may I have a drink?"
Qi Jia said: "No, I already told you I'm allergic to alcohol."

The scene shifts to 2009, Lin Shuer is leaning on the railing, singing: "Every year at this time, those who are graduating turn the quiet summer night into a wild and sentimental one. Three bottles of drink in my belly, all my sentimentality turns into a stomachache. Unhappy things seem to become happy."
Lin Shuer said: "This wedding dress cost me five hundred yuan to rent."
Lin Shuer said: "Look at this lack of spirit."
Lin Shuer said: "Can't get it dirty."
The two sat on the steps, Qi Jia took a sip of beer, and Lin Shuer said: "I have a stomachache."
Lin Shuer asked: "Stomachache?"
The bride-to-be said: "Shouldn't my heart be aching instead?"
Lin Shuer said: "You deserve it." The two sat on the steps, looking dejected. Lin Shuer put her arm around Qi Jia's shoulder, and Qi Jia leaned her head on her shoulder, crying.
Qi Jia said: "That bastard Liu Chong."
The scene shifts to the dormitory, where a male student is hanging clothes and says, "Chong your ass, he flew away this afternoon."
The scene shifts to the dormitory, where a girl says: "When he left, he asked me to take good care of his turtle."

The scene shifts to the hospital, where the couple is sitting on a bench. The man says, "What turtle?" "If I were you." "I'd take the opportunity to blind him." "Pierce his mouth." "You're such a wimp."

The scene shifts to the dormitory, where the girls are sitting in a circle, each holding a string of LED lights, connecting them together to form a large string of lights. They are laughing and chatting as they work.

The scene shifts to the campus, where a group of students are sitting on the lawn, chatting and laughing. A girl in a white dress is being pulled away by her friend, and the boy she's leaving behind is crying out, "Don't leave, don't you leave. Who the hell will pick up the soap for me if you go?"
The scene shifts to the campus, where a girl in a wedding dress is walking with her best friend. Two shirtless men run up to them, shouting, 'I'm graduating!'
The scene shifts, and the three of them are running on the street. Lin Shuer says, 'Congratulations on finding your group, you crazy person.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_4380_4560.text: Qi Jia, with a face full of water, said: "If we are about to die later on," "can you get away from me?" "I don't want others to find us and say we died together due to a flood."
Qi Jia, sitting in the car, looked at the rain-soaked road ahead, feeling a bit lost.
Qi Jia said: "Yuan Xiaoou, why do you want to die with me? Are you shy?"

Qi Jia, who was sitting in the back seat, was also swept into the water by the flood. She grabbed Yuan Xiaoou's collar and said, 'Do you think I'm short of your breath? Open your mouth! Open it, Yuan Xiaoou!'
Yuan Xiaoou said: "You want to hold your breath, right?" "If you're going to hold your breath, I will hold mine with you."

Qi Jia, with a face full of mud, looked at Yuan Xiaoou with a face full of mud, and Yuan Xiaoou, with a face full of mud, looked at Qi Jia with a face full of mud. They looked at each other, and Yuan Xiaoou slowly moved closer to Qi Jia, and Qi Jia, with a face full of mud, leaned in to kiss Yuan Xiaoou.
Qi Jia said, "I really think it's good to die with you."
Qi Jia leaned on Yuan Xiaoou's shoulder and said, "Can I hug you?"
Qi Jia, holding Yuan Xiaoou, said, 'Where's my car? If I can't find it later, I'll be in trouble.'
Qi Jia, holding the phone, looked at the message from Yuan Xiaoou and said, 'Hurry back and rescue us, the water has already seeped into the car. Hurry up! Hurry up!'

Qi Jia, who was sitting in the back seat, was also swept into the water by the torrential rain. Yuan Xiaoou, who was holding Qi Jia, was also swept into the water. The two of them were floating in the water, with the rain getting heavier and heavier.

The two of them walked down the stairs, Yuan Xiaoou with arms crossed, Qi Jia with a limp, they walked side by side, Yuan Xiaoou's eyes were fixed on the ground, Qi Jia looked up at him, Yuan Xiaoou turned his head away, Qi Jia looked up at him again, Yuan Xiaoou turned his head away again, Qi Jia looked up at him once more, Yuan Xiaoou turned his head away once more,
Qi Jia, with her head down, walked out of the house, and Yuan Xiaoou followed her, calling out, 'Qi Jia.'
Yuan Xiaoou crossed his arms and said, "Do you think I still need to go to Shanghai?"
Qi Jia, holding the clothes, said: "Go" "Isn't Shanghai quite good?"
Qi Jia, holding the documents, walked up to Yuan Xiaoou, who was standing in the rain, and said, "I'm leaving."
Qi Jia turned and left, Yuan Xiaoou watched her leave, then turned around and walked back to the door, leaning against the door frame with arms crossed, thinking.

movie101_7101937153785102885_4560_4740.text: The scene shifts to the evening, and Yuan Xiaoou is seen walking out of the house.

The scene shifts to the hospital room, where Qi Jia sits on the bed, looking out the window. The curtains are drawn, and the room is filled with various potted plants. Qi Jia is wearing a hospital gown, with a bandage on her lower right abdomen. She looks at the ceiling, then at the window, and finally, her gaze falls to the ground.
Qi Jia, with her back to the door, slowly squatted down, her eyes fixed on the envelope on the ground. She reached out and picked it up, her heart racing with anticipation.
Qi Jia looked at the envelope, then opened it to find a stack of bills inside. She flipped through them, one by one, but there was no letter from Yuan Xiaoou.
Qi Jia's phone rang, and she saw it was a call from Yuan Xiaoou. She hesitated for a moment, then answered the call.

The letter continued: "First and foremost, you must take your medicine on time, two bowls with half a pot of water, drink it after breakfast and dinner, the one at night doesn't need to be reheated, just warm it in hot water. Don't panic when you forget your keys, I've hidden a spare one in the electricity meter box at the door, you'll touch it as you reach out. You can't give up on exercise halfway, you must add ten sit-ups every week, and running must be an hour after dinner. When running, don't think about anything, just run."
Qi Jia walked into the kitchen, opened the drawer, and saw a row of kitchen knives.

Yuan Xiaoou said, 'Qi Jia, don't cry for the people who don't deserve it. Be the real you. You are kind, but good people should treat themselves better. When you're tired, sleep; when you wake up, smile. Simple life is the best. Thank you. Qi Jia, I'm leaving.'
Yuan Xiaoou, who was tidying up the room, heard the noise and turned around to see Qi Jia standing at the door. Yuan Xiaoou quickly hid the cactus behind the curtain.

Qi Jia, who was watering the cactus, was startled by the sudden appearance of Yuan Xiaoou. She quickly hid behind the curtain, her face full of fear. Yuan Xiaoou walked up to the cactus and touched it with his finger, and Qi Jia, who was hiding behind the curtain, watched him with wide eyes.
Qi Jia, holding the cactus, smiled at the cactus in her hand, then turned and left the house. She walked on the lawn in front of the house, then entered the building.

movie101_7101937153785102885_4740_4920.text: Qi Jia walked out of the company, and a truck drove by. The driver said, 'Don't you value your life?!'

The exhibition hall was filled with people, and the walls were plastered with posters of the tree. The tree was painted in various postures, and the posters were filled with text.
Qi Jia looked at the painting, which depicted a large tree in the center, with a small figure of a girl sitting at its base. The girl was looking up at the tree, her face full of admiration and joy.
Qi Jia looked at the painting and was stunned. The painting depicted a mother and son embracing under a tree. The title read 'Mother and Son.'

Qi Jia looked at the paintings on the wall, which were all about her and Yuan Xiaoou. The paintings showed the two of them kissing under a tree, embracing each other, and even their wedding scene was depicted in one painting.
Qi Jia looked at the paintings on the wall, her eyes filled with tears. She walked forward, her eyes fixed on the paintings, her face full of sorrow.
Qi Jia looked at the painting and said: "I want to be like this painting when I grow up."
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Don't worry, as long as I'm here, I'll definitely protect both of you." The two of them were still fighting, and Yuan Xiaoou was holding a girl in his arms.
Qi Jia, who was about to leave, was pulled back by Yuan Xiaoou. Yuan Xiaoou said: "Don't worry, I'll definitely cure you."
The scene shifts to a flooded street, where Yuan Xiaoou is holding Qi Jia in the car, with the water level reaching their chests.
Qi Jia walked out of the exhibition hall, and the scene gradually faded to black.
The scene shifts to 2014, the year Qi Jia and Yuan Xiaoou met, in the bustling city of Shanghai.

The scene shifts to the elevator, where a group of people are getting off. The man in the suit says, 'See you.' The elevator doors close, and the man in the suit walks out of the elevator, looking around. He then walks towards the reception desk.
The scene shifts to the interior of an office furniture store, where Yuan Xiaoou is on the phone. He walks out of the fitting room, and the employees clear a path for him.
The man said: "Oh man, these two foreigners can really drink, they nearly drank me to death last night, but yes." Everyone cheered and applauded.

movie101_7101937153785102885_4920_5100.text: Yuan Xiaoou was at a networking event, his phone rang, he answered the call and said: 'Hey, rich lady, what made you think of calling me?'
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Yo, I was even worried that you were too busy with state affairs to take my call."
Yuan Xiaoou said: "What am I busy with? It’s not that I don’t contact you all because I’m afraid you wouldn’t want to deal with me."
Lin Shuer said: 'I knew you’d try to turn it around. You’re really shining in Shanghai, aren’t you?'
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Don’t say that... Whenever you want to come to Shanghai, I'm always ready to welcome you."
Lin Shuer said: "Look at you, sweet talker. When Qi Jia went to Shanghai, I didn’t see you being so attentive."
Yuan Xiaoou asked, "When did she come to Shanghai?"
Yuan Xiaoou: "She's been there for a while now, currently in the hospital."
Yuan Xiaoou asked, "Why is she still in the hospital?"
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Qi Jia has been in Shanghai for almost a year now."
Yuan Xiaoou asked, "No, which hospital is she in?"

Yuan Xiaoou said, "What, you want to visit her? I’m telling you, you’re too late. Even if you saw her, you wouldn’t recognize her. Do you know why you can’t catch up with Qi Jia, blockhead? It’s not because you’re poor, dumb, and ugly; it’s simple, because you lack the savvy."
Yuan Xiaoou, while walking, said: "Stop the bullshit and just tell me which hospital and what ward she's in."
Yuan Xiaoou drove to the entrance of the hospital, parked the car, and ran into the hospital.
Yuan Xiaoou ran into the hospital lobby, looking around frantically. He ran to the front desk and asked, "Have you seen this girl?"
Yuan Xiaoou ran through the lobby, heading towards the elevator, while Lin Shuer was still on the phone.
The scene shifts to the hospital lobby, where Yuan Xiaoou is pacing back and forth. A nurse comes out and calls out to him. He turns around and walks towards the nurse.
Yuan Xiaoou, who was sitting in the lobby, saw Lin Shuer coming out and immediately stood up to greet her.
Yuan Xiaoou looked at the girl in front of him, his eyes full of confusion. He slowly squatted down, looked at the girl, and said, 'Qi Jia.'
Yuan Xiaoou took the cigarette, and Lin Shuer lit it for him. Yuan Xiaoou looked at Lin Shuer and said, "You've been in Shanghai for such a long time, why didn't you contact me?"
Yuan Xiaoou asked, 'Who are you?'
Yuan Xiaoou said: "I'm Yuan Xiaoou" "Little turtle" "I'm sorry"
Yuan Xiaoou said, 'How did you become like this? It’s all my fault. Even when you rejected me back then...'

movie101_7101937153785102885_5100_5280.text: Yuan Xiaoou said: "Reject me," "If I don't leave," "I can take care of you forever," "You wouldn't have ended up like this."
Yuan Xiaoou said: "What did you say? I don't understand."
Yuan Xiaoou said: "I said I want to be with you forever. We will never part."
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Well if you want to be with her, I am going back to Xiamen"
Yuan Xiaoou looked at Qi Jia and asked, "Who is she?"
Yuan Xiaoou said: "She is my cousin" "She has been sick recently so I came to Shanghai to see her"
Yuan Xiaoou looked at Qi Jia, then turned his head and licked his lips, and said: "You've been in Shanghai for so long, why didn't you find me?"
"Why should I find you""You are a promising young man, I am an old woman""So I have to see if you already have a harem"

Yuan Xiaoou held Qi Jia in his arms, and they kissed passionately. The kiss was deep and long, and the two of them were immersed in it. After a while, they separated, and Qi Jia looked at Yuan Xiaoou with a smile.

Yuan Xiaoou said: "Qi Jia". Yuan Xiaoou's eyes were full of love for Qi Jia, and he reached out to take the ring from Qi Jia's hand. Qi Jia shyly covered her chest, and Yuan Xiaoou took the ring and put it on Qi Jia's finger.
Yuan Xiaoou took out the ring and said: "I've been carrying it, and I always thought""I will meet you someday"

"Qi Jia said: \"I shouldn't have let you go\". After saying that, Qi Jia turned and left, leaving Yuan Xiaoou kneeling on the ground, holding the ring in his hand, looking at the place where Qi Jia left, his eyes were full of reluctance.
Yuan Xiaoou said, "Can you give me a chance? I want to take care of you forever."
Qi Jia turned around, looking at the ring in Yuan Xiaoou's hand, and then turned back to look at him. After a moment of hesitation, she said, "Okay."
Yuan Xiaoou took the ring from Qi Jia's hand and carefully placed it on her ring finger.

Qi Jia, with tears in her eyes, hugged Yuan Xiaoou tightly. Yuan Xiaoou held Qi Jia in his arms, and they embraced each other tightly. The screen gradually fades to black, and the movie title 'A Kwaakye Marriage' appears.
Qi Jia said: "I Qi Jia am willing to marry you Liu Chong. Whether in health or even better health, in my lifetime I will love you, be loyal to you, cherish you, until death do us part."
The man in the graduation gown said, "I'm not ready yet." The classmates around him started to laugh.

movie101_7101937153785102885_600_780.text: Qi Jia said: "That's quite a lot."
Qi Jia said: "We're all in the same boat, I should help them out."
Lin Shuer said: "Don't go, come back."
Qi Jia said: "Go back to the dormitory, there's stomach medicine there, hurry."
Qi Jia, who was holding Lin Shuer, was pushed to the ground by Lin Shuer, and Qi Jia said: "Oh my, Lin Shuer"
Qi Jia said: "Stop messing around."
Qi Jia said, "We're here, we're here."
Qi Jia and Lin Shuer were banging on the door, Qi Jia said: "Why can't this door be opened?"
Qi Jia said: "Isn't our dorm empty?" "Hey, hey, hey, open up, open up, it's a raid!"
Qi Jia said: "Open up, open up"
The two of them then took off Yuan Xiaoou's clothes and said, 'Take off your clothes.'
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Look, look, who is it?"
Qi Jia said: "Yuan Xiaoou". Yuan Xiaoou was startled, and Qi Jia quickly covered him with a towel.

Yuan Xiaoou, who was changing clothes, heard the shout and immediately ran out. The bridesmaids, seeing this, also ran out. Yuan Xiaoou ran downstairs in a panic, but his shoe was left behind. He had to go back to get it, and the bridesmaids, seeing this, also ran downstairs.
Qi Jia and Lin Shuer ran into the room and saw Lao Bai wrapped in a blanket, saying, 'Lao Bai, why are you sleeping in my bed?'
Lao Bai said: "All my luggage is on the bed. Unless you want us to sleep on the floor." Lao Bai then turned to Qi Jia and said: "You almost forced him to jump out the window."
Qi Jia said: "Sigh, Yuan Xiaoou is the most honest guy in our class, and even him? You're such a beast."
Lao Bai said: "Hey, he pushed me down, okay?" "Yuan Xiaoou burst in, knelt on the floor, and tearfully confessed he's had a crush on me for four years."
Qi Jia said: "He usually seems so quiet."
Lao Bai said: "Hey, if I didn't show my gratitude for his support in real action, would I still be considered human?"
Qi Jia said: "Well, anyway, you and Yuan Xiaoou go to Suzhou together. I wish you happiness."
Qi Jia said: "My relationship with him is pure."
Qi Jia said: "You sleep on my bed, and now you take my bed sheet too."
Lao Bai said: "Hey, hey, hey, forget it, they both slept on it. What do you want it for? Just take it."
Lao Bai said: "Goodbye my sisters, bye." Lao Bai turned around and left, while Qi Jia and Lin Shuer exchanged a glance and then looked at the painting on the wall.
Qi Jia said: "I never would have thought that Yuan Xiaoou neither went to Suzhou with Lao Bai nor returned to his home in the Northeast. Two months later, he appeared at my doorstep."
The scene shifts to a cat lying on a wall, watching the people below. A man sits on the ground, eating an ice pop and looking at his phone. A small dog runs by, and the man looks up at the dog.
Yuan Xiaoou asked, "Did your wife kick you out too?" The beggar shook his head, and Yuan Xiaoou continued eating an ice cream.
The vagabond said, 'Once I get my house back, I'll save the balcony for you. Women are all the same. Men are still better.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_60_240.text: The little girl said: "Sit down."

The little girl agreed, "Okay." Qi Jia patted the little girl's face, then turned to look at the mother and daughter sitting not far away. The mother was wearing a leopard print shirt, while the daughter was in a denim jacket. They exchanged a glance, then Qi Jia turned back to look out the window.
Qi Jia looked at the mother and daughter, then turned to look out the window. The mother and daughter exchanged a glance, and the mother nodded slightly.
Qi Jia sat in the car, looking out the window, her eyes vacant. She was lost in thought, her mind drifting back to the day she met Liu Chong.
Qi Jia said: "Looking at this extremely familiar place, I realized that I have indeed entered menopause. Because it's in menopause that one loves to chew on the painful black memories of one's life."
The scene shifts to 2009, Qi Jia is running on the street in a wedding dress, with people on both sides of the road clapping and cheering.
The scene shifts, and Qi Jia is seen running on the street in a wedding dress, with a group of people following behind her.

The scene shifts to the graduation ceremony, where Lin Shuer, dressed in a wedding gown, slowly walks onto the stage. A classmate, seeing this, quickly follows behind her, adjusting her gown as they walk. The students below the stage are all taking photos of Lin Shuer, and the graduation ceremony officially begins.

Lin Shuer, dressed in a wedding gown, walked onto the stage with Liu Chong. The students below applauded and cheered. Lin Shuer, holding Liu Chong's hand, said: "Red envelope, Red envelope, I will send you my bank account."

Qi Jia, dressed in a white graduation gown and holding a bouquet of flowers, walked onto the stage with a beaming smile. Lin Shuer, dressed in a black graduation gown, helped Qi Jia sit down. Qi Jia sat down and asked, 'What are you doing?'
Lin Shuer said: "I am willing" "From Beijing to Xiamen" "2000 kilometers" "I give you a promise" "I am willing"
Principal said: "Students, next, please representative of the graduates, classmate Liu Chong, onto the stage for a speech."

Liu Chong stood up and walked towards the stage, while Lin Shuer sat in the front row, smiling at him. Liu Chong walked onto the stage with a beaming smile, and the audience below applauded enthusiastically.
Liu Chong said: "We are about to say goodbye to the campus" "and head towards all the wide world"
Lin Shuer said: "You have to flick the tassel when you go on stage later" "How can you do that dressed like this?"
Qi Jia said: "I flicked my bangs."
Liu Chong continued: "Our initial dreams," "held tightly in our hands."

The graduation ceremony for the 2009 class is about to begin. The students below the stage are all dressed in their caps and gowns, sitting in neat rows, and the stage is set with a red carpet. Liu Chong walks onto the stage in a graduation gown and cap, followed by Lin Shuer in a white wedding dress. The students below the stage applaud and cheer, and the stage is filled with applause.
The classmates below the stage were cheering for them to get married, shouting: 'Marry, marry, marry.'

Principal said: "Quiet down please" "I have been a wedding witness several times" "But I have never done it at a graduation ceremony" "So" "Can the female student in the white dress please come up on stage?"

Qi Jia, dressed in a white graduation gown and cap, walked onto the stage with a beaming smile. She looked at Liu Chong in her gown and cap, and the two of them exchanged a glance. Principal called out to Qi Jia, and Qi Jia walked up to Principal with a radiant smile.

movie101_7101937153785102885_780_960.text: Yuan Xiaoou said: "Don't grab my bag, I've told you."
Yuan Xiaoou said: "I have to go home."
Qi Jia said: "If you continue like this, I will call the police."
Yuan Xiaoou, holding a bun, ran over and said, 'What are you doing?' 'Stop it, what are you doing?' 'Don't make trouble.'
Yuan Xiaoou, holding a popsicle, said: "So you want to play nasty games with me?"
Yuan Xiaoou, holding a glass of water, walked up to Vagrant and said: "This is my home, give me the keys."
Yuan Xiaoou said: "How many times have I told you, that's not your home."
Yuan Xiaoou said: "People say it's not your home."
Yuan Xiaoou said: "If you continue like this, I will call the police."
Yuan Xiaoou said: "It's just a key, come on, take it." Vagrant took the key and left.
Vagrant said: "I said you two must be having an affair."
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Girl, his words..." Yuan Xiaoou was about to explain when Vagrant suddenly appeared in front of them.
Qi Jia said: "I'm not going."
Yuan Xiaoou, covering his eyes, said, 'Senior brother, you got the wrong person.' At this moment, Lin Shuer opened the door and walked in. Yuan Xiaoou quickly hid behind the door.
Lin Shuer walked in and said: "Yuan Xiaou, how did you bring him here?"
Qi Jia said: "I ran into that vagabond again, and Yuan Xiaou saved me."
Lin Shuer said: "I knew this rent couldn't be so cheap for no reason. But how did you end up here? At this moment in time, shouldn't you be watching the sunset with Old Bai in Suzhou?"
Yuan Xiaoou said: "I am not going to Suzhou."
Lin Shuer said: "Ah, you're not going to Suzhou, what about your job?"
Yuan Xiaoou: "I'll find another one."
Qi Jia said: "Lin Shuer, come over here. Let him squeeze in with us. He's our classmate."
Lin Shuer said: "Squeeze in, get pregnant, is it yours or mine, did you forget his thing with Old Bai, he's very thirsty, this is like leading the wolf into the room."
Qi Jia said: "But that vagabond is afraid of him."
Lin Shuer said: "Just him, that small size."
Qi Jia said: "It's better to have than not, at least he can take a knife."
Lin Shuer said: "Alright. But he can't stay for long."
Qi Jia said: "Yuan Xiaou, don't go, live here."
Qi Jia's mother said: "That vagabond often makes trouble, right?"
Qi Jia nodded and said, 'Hmm.'
Yuan Xiaoou asked: 'What, are you scared?'
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Just kidding, don't worry, I will protect both of you in the future. Ah, I even have some chest muscles."
Yuan Xiaoou said: "From now on, you block the knives and take the punches."
"Got it," Lin Shuer said, then turned and left. Yuan Xiaoou watched her leave, then turned to look at Qi Jia.

Yuan Xiaoou said: "Don't get used to living here, you should find a room as soon as possible." After saying that, Yuan Xiaoou turned and left. Lin Shuer watched Yuan Xiaoou's retreating figure, feeling a bit guilty. Yuan Xiaoou drove home, his mind still preoccupied with the events of the day.
Qi Jia, who was sitting in the passenger seat, was thrown out of the car. Lin Shuer got out of the car and said, "Qi Jia, get up."
Qi Jia said, 'Let me vomit for a while.' 'Hey, I didn't drink too much.'
Lin Shuer said, "I told you to drink less, you didn't listen."
Qi Jia said: "I'm in menopause now, I want to toast to youth."
Qi Jia said: "Keep your voice down."
Qi Jia said: "I want to get angry, I want to lose my temper."

movie101_7101937153785102885_960_1140.text: Lin Shuer said: "What in the world are you doing, howling and wailing in the middle of the night? Did you forget to take your medicine before going out?"
Lin Shuer said: 'Come down, and let's settle this once and for all'
Lin Shuer said: "Let's go home"
Lin Shuer said: "Hermaphroditic and not a single part of the body intact, huh?"
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Say that again, who are you calling hermaphroditic?"
Yuan Xiaoou said, 'You're hermaphroditic!'
The neighbor, pointing at them, said, 'You stand right there, don't you walk away!'
Lin Shuer said: "Hermaphroditic and not a single part of the body intact, huh?"
Yuan Xiaoou opened the window and shouted, 'What are you two doing?'
The man said: "Take care of your wife."
Qi Jia said: "You're the one who's his wife!"
Yuan Xiaoou said, 'Sorry, big sister, they drank too much. Please, please, don't stoop to their level.'
The neighbor, sticking his head out of the window, said, 'Are you guys sick or something? Looking for a beating are we?'
The neighbor, annoyed, said: 'Beat, beat, beat... beat your head, what's with all the noise in the middle of the night.'
Yuan Xiaoou: "From what's coming out of your head"
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Wait for me"
Lin Shuer said: "Are you insane?"
Qi Jia said: "Yuan Xiaoou was scrambling down like a dog."
Qi Jia said, "Don't tell him that I'm going through menopause."
Lin Shuer said: "It's okay, there's no shame in having a physical illness."
Yuan Xiaoou ran over and said, 'What's going on? Why did you let her drink so much again?'
Qi Jia said: "I'm upset, can't I drink a bit more?"
Yuan Xiaoou said: "So you don't want me to speak up because you're afraid I'll steal your lines, huh?"
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Can it kill you?"
Yuan Xiaoou said: "That wouldn't happen."
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Do you know that drinking can kill you?"
Qi Jia said: "What are you trying to pull on me?"
Lin Shuer said, 'No one is going to die.'
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Drink, drink"
Yuan Xiaoou said: "No, no one will die."
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Qi Jia went to the hospital today" "She's not actually going through menopause"
Yuan Xiaoou asked, 'Then what's wrong with her?'
Lin Shuer said, 'She's pregnant.'
Yuan Xiaoou said: 'Who are you kidding? There would have to be a man involved,' 'She's not an earthworm that can get pregnant on her own.'
Yuan Xiaoou asked, 'Are you with her 24 hours a day?' 'How do you know she didn't have a chance?'
Yuan Xiaoou asked, 'Who is the father of the child?'
Lin Shuer said: "The father of the child ran away."
Yuan Xiaoou said: "She wants to keep the baby."
Yuan Xiaoou nodded and said, "Hmm."
Yuan Xiaoou, with a look of resignation, said, 'Fine, then I'll marry her.'
Lin Shuer laughed and said, 'Sucker, fighting for a cuckold's hat, huh?' 'I always said you loved Qi Jia, but you never admitted it.'
Yuan Xiaoou said: "No, I care about both of you equally. If the father of your child ran away, I'd take care of you too."
Lin Shuer said: "Get out of here, stop pretending to be something you're not, acting like a love saint."
Yuan Xiaoou said: 'No. So what's really going on?'
Yuan Xiaoou walked into the room, sat on the bed, and held Qi Jia's hand. He looked at Qi Jia and said, 'I'm sorry, Mom.'
The scene shifts to the hospital lobby, where Qi Jia is sitting on a leather sofa, reading a book. Yuan Xiaoou is browsing through books on the shelves.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: Wang Xiaobing said: 'You look a lot more like him.'
Huang Dage said: "What's the matter? Speak."
Wang Xiaobing said, "Brother, this is the situation. My girl is sick and waiting for money to have surgery in the hospital. I'm afraid that if the prices go up, I won't be able to get a job."
Huang Dage said: "I don't think you're unable to get a job. You just don't want to work anymore, do you?"
Huang Dage said: 'Isn't that right?'
Wang Xiaobing: "Kneel down"
Wang Xiaobing said: 'San Er, don't make trouble. Go buy two packs of cigarettes.'
San Er said, 'Brother, I have some here. You, you smoke first.'
Huang Dage said: "Get lost, this is not your business. Go away."
Wang Xiaobing said, 'Brother, take care.'
San Er said: "You know the rules here. If you want to fight, you have to cripple. If you want to punish, you have to pay money."
Wang Xiaobing said: 'Big brother, I also have some problems here. I lost my case.'
Wang Xiaobing: "Yo"
Huang Dage said: "Looking at your outfit, you're not a person who runs errands on the street. A journalist, right? Search him."
Wang Xiaobing quickly stepped forward to stop him, saying, 'Brother, he's not a journalist.'
Huang Dage said: "If you really want to fight, someone will die here today."
Huang Dage said: "If you dare, let him go." "Tell me, what are you here for?"
Huang Dage said: "It's one thing to beat us, but stealing my case? Don't go too far."
Huang Dage asked: "Who hit you? Where?"
Wang Xiaobing replied, "On the street."

Huang Dage said: 'My people never fight in the street. They won't steal your things. If you get beaten up, go to the police. The same goes if you lose your case. I can't help you. I won't take care of it.'
Wang Xiaobing said: "My brother already paid the protection fee."
Huang Dage said: "What the hell is the protection fee?"
Huang Dage said: "That's called"
Wang Xiaobing said: "That's called a management fee."
Huang Dage said: 'I paid the management fee.'
Huang Dage said: "Oh my, you thought this was the underworld? This is a logistics company, understand? Do you understand what a logistics company is?"
Wang Xiaobing said: "I'm hungry."
Huang Dage said: 'Do you think it's easy to do this job on the street? We should talk about affection, righteousness, civility, and manners.'
Wang Xiaobing said: "Right."

Huang Dage said: "Rules. Do you think I like to raise the price? Is it easy for us brothers to live? There's pressure to have a place to live, to eat, to use water and electricity, all kinds of pressure. Everything else is going up in price. Can I not raise it? Am I not embarrassed if I don't raise it?"
Wang Xiaobing said: "No, no, no, I'm sorry."
Huang Dage said: "If we don't raise prices, there's no future in what we do."
Huang Dage said: "I'll go check it out."
A man said: "He's absolutely right."
Huang Dage said, "Listen to me, in consideration of your being a fellow townsman, I'll let you off this time. Get lost."
Wang Xiaobing said: "Thank you, Brother Huang."
Huang Dage said: "Come back." Huang Dage took a puff of his cigarette and continued: "I'll borrow it." "Take it."
Wang Xiaobing said, "Brother, this, this isn't right."
Huang Dage said: "If I tell you to take it, you take it."
Huang Dage said: "Take it, take it, take it."
Huang Dage said: "Listen to me, take this money, cure your daughter's illness. If your daughter's illness is not cured, I'll beat you every time I see you. Do you hear me?"
Huang Dage said: 'Go, go, go, go.'
Wang Xiaobing said, "Thank you, thank you, sisters."
Huang Dage said: "You'd better go."

movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.text: Man, who was beaten, was still not giving up. He said: "Take that broom down" "I think this brother is not easy."
Driver said: "You guys are blessed in disguise."
Driver said: "So, thank Brother Huang for me." "Thank you, I'm very ashamed."
Driver: "Roll aside."
Bald Man said: "The car you guys bought" "was the previous owner called Wan Peng?" "You dare to buy his car" "Countless people are looking for him"
Driver asked, "Hey, brother, what's going on? Can you clarify a bit?"
Bald Man said: "Go find out yourself."
Driver: "Hey, bro, hey, bro, you said, bro, hey, hey, what are you doing, it hurts."
Xu Decai said: "Go and find that Wan Peng quickly."
Driver: "Ouch, this hurts."
The scene shifts to the street, where a van slowly drives into the alley. The driver looks at Xu Decai in the passenger seat and asks, 'The person you talked about, is he here?'
Driver said: "Wan, Wan Peng, no, not him, my daughter is here, I need to send the money to the hospital first."
Xu Decai said: "Do you have a clue? How can this little money be enough? Go and find the box first. Once you find the box, it will end all the problems."
Driver looked at Man and said: "Brother, there is actually money in the box, right?"
Xu Decai said: "If there's no money in the box, you're not gonna look for it, right?"
Driver said: "No, I just want to know whether you're looking for the box or helping your niece with treatments."
Xu Decai said: "Both."
Driver said: "Well, in that case, why don't we make a written agreement or something?"
Driver said: "No, no need, no need. Let's go, let's go."
Driver asked: "What are you going to do?"
Driver said: "Didn't you say that we needed to find the box?"
Driver said: "Go on, go on."
Driver quickly stepped forward and said: "Bro, bro, bro, bro, bro, when you see my wife and daughter later, can you please respect me a little?"
Driver looked at the van, then at the woman taking pictures, and then at the van again. The woman was taking pictures of the van, and Driver was stunned.
Driver and Xu Decai followed Doctor out of the ward. Driver said: "Doctor Zhang, hello, hello, hello, I am the father of Wang Rui, how is she doing now?"

Doctor said: "Her condition is basically stable right now, and the child is also very strong. The hospital has thought of all possible ways. The most important thing right now is medicine for surgery, imported medicine. We have to rush and order it from abroad. This way we can reduce some risks. If you don't pay the day after tomorrow, it will be too late."
Driver said: "Got it, I understand."

Doctor, who was about to leave, suddenly remembered something and said: "Ah, oh dear, ah, my memory, Xu Decai, we have had dinner together, I brought two of our female nurses from the department with me."
Driver said: "We never had dinner, you must be mistaken."
Doctor said: "No way, how could I possibly misremember."
Driver said: "I have a too common face, it must have confused you."
A nurse came running and said: "Doctor, Doctor, patient on bed 309 is getting fever again." Doctor took off his mask and rushed to the ward, and Xu Decai and Driver followed.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.text: Wife, who was tidying up, heard the noise and turned around. Seeing it was Wang Xiaobing, she quickly stood up and asked, "You've come?"
Wife: "Ah."
Wife, who was about to go in, was stopped by Wang Xiaobing. Wife looked at the money in Wang Xiaobing's hand and said, "This is the money a big brother gave, take it for now."
Wife said: "You should go in later, they are just getting an IV."
Wife: "Yes."
Wife said: "The kid was in so much pain last night that he couldn't sleep."
Wife, leaning against the wall, looked at her husband with a face full of grievance. Xu Decai said, "You’ve been working hard these past few days."

Wife said, 'I'm fine. I wish I could take this pain for Daughter. What should we do? We still need so much more money. That director came again yesterday. They said if we can’t raise enough, the surgery could be at risk.'
Wang Xiaobing said: "It's okay, my dear, it's okay, I'm here. I will find a way for sure. No problem at all.'Ah, this is Xu Decai brother I often talk about with you."
Wife said: "Big brother."
Wang Xiaobing said: "All right, all right, all right."
Wang Xiaobing's Wife said, "Thank you."
Wife quickly helped Daughter to lie down on the bed. Wang Xiaobing and Xu Decai also came in. Daughter looked at her father and said, 'Dad, you’re here.'
Wang Xiaobing said, "Daddy missed you. Does it hurt?"
Daughter said: "It doesn’t hurt, daddy. I want to go home. I still have to go to school."

Wang Xiaobing said: "Don't worry, daddy will get you home soon. Once we’re home, you can go back to school, we won’t miss any lessons. Look, daddy even brought your backpack for you. Look, English, Maths."
Wife said: "Now we can catch up on everything you’ve missed."
Wang Xiaobing said: "Quickly find the box, it will solve everything."
Wife said: "You can go if you have things to take care of."
Wang Xiaobing said: "My girl, don’t worry, you’ll be out of the hospital soon. You'll be home before you know it. Be strong, you’re dad’s bravest girl."

Daughter said, "Goodbye, Daddy." Wang Xiaobing left the ward with a smile, and Xu Decai followed him out. The two walked side by side in the hospital corridor. Xu Decai suddenly stopped, and Wang Xiaobing followed suit.
The scene shifts to the hospital, where Wife is holding Daughter's hand, feeding her an apple. Daughter takes a bite and starts coughing violently.
The girl said: "Yo, Yashi, Yashi."

movie101_7166164445343941151_1620_1800.text: Woman said: "Why haven't you contacted me at all?"

The man said: 'Yashi, don't worry, I won't allow anyone to bully you.'
Woman looked at the caller ID and said: 'The boss is here, I have to go.'
The man said: 'Oh man, we barely talked again. How tragic.'

Driver was scrolling through Weibo on his phone when he saw a post about a delivery truck with a tarpaulin covering the back. The post included a photo of the truck and a description of the driver being shot in the leg. Driver muttered to himself, 'Seems like you don't want to survive here anymore.'
The man said: 'Guys, it's that car, get it for me.'
The man in the raincoat was running wildly on the street, with a group of people on bicycles closely following him.

The man in the white T-shirt, who was tied up, was cut free by the dog trader. The man in the white T-shirt said, 'You're free now!' The man in the white T-shirt was then taken away by the dog trader.
Driver said: 'Wait here for a moment, I'll drive the car.' Then Driver ran off, shouting: 'Who let my dogs go? My dogs!'
Driver, who was running away, was chased by Xu Decai. Xu Decai shouted, 'Stop right there, idiot, over here, he's running!'
Driver, who was running, was chased by the police and shouted, 'Stop right there!'
The man in the white T-shirt rode his bike onto the road, splashing mud and water as he passed by the entrance of the internet cafe.
Driver, who was running, slipped and fell. He got up and continued running, with the man on the bike closely following. Driver shouted, 'Stop right there!'
Driver chased after the man and said, 'Stop right there! Tell me, why did you let my dogs go?'
The man said: 'I looked you up online. You're planning to sell the dogs to a restaurant.'
Driver, angrily, said: 'Bullshit! Bullshit! Bullshit! What's it to you? What's it to you?'
Driver said: 'Hey, why are you hitting him? If you keep hitting him, I'll call the police, I'm telling you!'
Driver said: 'Who hit anyone? I didn't hit anyone! I didn't hit anyone!'
Driver said: 'Dogs are man's best friend. You should treat them well!'
Driver shouted: 'I'll treat you well! Who the hell is going to take care of me?'
The driver, seeing the situation, quickly ran to the back of the truck, shouting, 'Hey, hey, hey, my car, my car!'
Driver shouted: 'Come here, come here, come here!'

movie101_7166164445343941151_1800_1980.text: Driver, panting, said, "My car, oh no. Don't worry about it, bro."
Driver said: "My car, my car, my car."
Traffic Police said: "Driver's license, vehicle registration."
Driver said: "It's in the car, in the car."
Traffic Police said: 'Go to the bank and pay the fine. If it's not settled by tomorrow morning, the traffic police squadron head Officer Guan will have your car towed.'
Driver said: "Brother, no, I just parked here, but they let my dog out, and I was chasing after the dog, bro, brother, I'm begging you, don't go, bro. My daughter is in the hospital, brother."
Driver, with a face full of foam, laughed heartily, then turned and walked away. The traffic police officer, seeing this, also left with an umbrella.
Driver took out a cigarette from his pocket, lit it, and started smoking.
Driver took out a cigarette and lit it for himself.
Driver said: "Brother, why didn't you watch my car? Now everything is gone."
Driver said, "Are you blaming me? Was that even a parking spot? This is what a parking space looks like; you had to park on the opposite side."
Driver said: "But don't parking spaces charge a fee?" Xu Decai shook his head.
Driver said: "Brother, it really is inconvenient for me. I hate cops. Look, releasing the dog was right, dogs are man's best friend. Aren't dogs more loyal than humans?"

Driver said: "Brother, why do I feel like I'm not living like a human anymore? I might as well stop living, I'll just sell my organs, not just a kidney, but my heart, liver, lungs, all of it. When they're gone, my ashes will be scattered across the motherland, do I count as having lived up to humanity, brother? All I want is to live a peaceful, stable life. Is that really too much to ask for?"
Driver, with his head down, wiped his tears with his hand, then sat on the ground and started crying. Xu Decai stood by with an umbrella, watching him.

movie101_7166164445343941151_180_360.text: The scene shifts to the car of Man, who is driving and looking around. The car is stopped at a red light, and the car's GPS navigation system is activated.
The car sped along the highway, with Policeman closely following in another car. Man suddenly noticed the rearview mirror swaying and quickly adjusted it.
Man in the passenger seat, wearing sunglasses, turned his head to look at the road ahead, then raised his hand to signal the driver to stop the car.

The scene shifts to the next day, Man in a suit and sunglasses stands by the roadside, a van slowly approaches, he raises his hand to signal the driver to stop, then walks to the passenger side window and taps on it.
Driver: 'Hey, bro, where are you going, get in.'
The man in the passenger seat said: "Bro, bro, where are you going?" "Bro." The man in the passenger seat was wearing sunglasses and a leather jacket, and the dog in the car was barking incessantly.
Driver got into the car and said, 'Hey, bro, where are you going, you scared me. Bro, you got on so fast. What's up, where are you heading to make some money? We have been together for several days.'
Man said: "No nonsense, drive fast, and take me to the airport. This is the fare."
Driver said: "Hey, what are you doing?"
Driver looked at Policeman and said, "Oh no, we can't go."
Policeman said: "What's going on? Don't you know you can't park here?"
Driver said: "No, no, no, my car is stalling. Look, it won't start. It won't start at all. Look, oh, it started."
Policeman said, 'Be careful. There is a repair station ahead. Go there for a repair quickly. Why are you on the run if your car is broken?'
Man said, 'You keep pretending not to know me, interesting? We can't just stop on the highway. If you have guts, jump off the car.'
Driver: 'We can't just stop on the highway. If you have guts, jump off the car.'
Driver said: 'I would rather jump off than stay with a turncoat like you.'

Man said: "See, what did you just say? It's offensive to call someone a turncoat. Moreover, if you hadn't disappeared for so many days back then, Yang Shan was so worried, she forced me to take her to find you. I had no idea you were messing around with that woman."
Man said: "Shut up."
Driver said: 'If I had known, I would... You are not even as good as a truckload of dogs that I pulled.'

The two of them were driving on the road, with the sun shining through the car window onto their faces. Man was wearing sunglasses and a hat, while Driver was looking at him with a puzzled expression. Suddenly, the car stopped at a toll booth.
Driver: "Where on earth are we, say something."
Driver said: "Didn't you tell me to shut up? Let's eat."
The man said, "What meal? I'm in a hurry to catch my flight."
Driver: 'Look how impatient you are, even if you are rushing to a rocket, you still have to eat.'
Driver said: "Don't move." The man in black got out of the car, looked at the little dog in the car, and then looked at Driver.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1980_2160.text: Driver, who was squatting on the ground, looked up at Xu Decai, Xu Decai took the umbrella from Driver's hand, and Driver left dejectedly.
Driver, holding an umbrella, walked out of the alley, and Xu Decai, who was following him, also walked out.
Xu Decai, holding an umbrella, followed behind him.

The scene shifts to the square in front of the county government building, where a group of people are performing a lion dance. Xu Decai and Driver are standing in the middle of the square, watching the performance.
Driver said: "You dare to hit me, if you dare to do it again, tell me clearly why you think you can hit me! I'm telling you, hey,"
Driver, who was walking on the street, was surrounded by a group of people. He asked: 'Who are you guys?'
Xu Decai pointed at Wan Peng and said: "You!" Wan Peng was scared and ran away. Xu Decai turned around and left.

The scene shifts, Wan Peng stands on the second-floor balcony with a loudspeaker, shouting: "I can't go on like this," "If I do, I'll have no shame or integrity," "It's against natural justice," "Today marks my Wan Peng's doom."
The crowd said: "Yes"
Driver: "But"
A man in the audience raised his hand and said: 'It's not fair.'
Wan Peng: "Not your tomorrow."
Xu Decai said: "You recognize the truth, huh?"

Driver said: "I recognize it, well, Wan Peng..." "What are you up to?" "And you?" "Hey," "what’s going on?" "You jump," "be careful," "your flowerpot might fall and hit someone!" "What's going on?" "This guy..." "Ah"
Neighbor said: "Yes, yes, yes, it's fine, nothing to worry about, he’s just drunk."
Wan Peng said: "Dammit, the police don’t take care of this kind of disturbance?"
Driver said: "He’s drunk, not driving drunk," "even if the cops come, it’s no big deal."
Driver said: "Bro, it must be because his girl left him."
Driver said: "It’s more serious than a girl leaving, his wife has run away."
Wan Peng said: "This darn fool wasn't always like this."
Old Man said: "What darn fool? I'm his dad."
Driver laughed and said: "Sorry, sorry, I'm sorry haha, but you really take it easy, playing chess while your son might jump off a building?"
Old Man said: "Grandson, go on and jump!"
Driver said: "Wait, wait, wait."
Driver said: "Old man, take it easy, cool down."
Driver said: "Bro, grandson, the generation gap is quite big, right?"
Driver said: "Quick, go up and get him down, if the police take him, then where will we search for him?"
Driver said: "Then, if I go up there and he jumps, does that make me a murderer?"
Driver said: "Put your heart at ease, if he wanted to jump, he would have done it by now."
Wan Peng said: "Why don’t you go up?"
Driver said: "I need to stay here," "what if he tries to run away?" "Be quick!" "Ah!"
Driver, who was standing in the crowd, was stunned by this scene. He looked at Xu Decai in disbelief, then turned to look at Wan Peng on the roof.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2160_2340.text: Wan Peng was washing his motorcycle in the yard when Driver suddenly appeared. Wan Peng asked, 'Hey, hey, hey, who are you?'
Driver said: "I..."
Driver said: "Mind your own business." Wan Peng, holding a loudspeaker, said: "Hey, hey, if you keep moving forward, I'm going to jump."
Wan Peng said: "Wait, calm down, you're scaring people. I'll ask you something, and then I'll leave."
Wan Peng said: "Ask."
Driver said: "I bought a car from you, remember?"
Wan Peng said: 'For repairs, you should go to the manufacturer..'
Driver said: 'Why would I go to the manufacturer.' 'I was driving with my friend in the car.' 'Someone hit us.' And then the suitcase was lost, I have to find the suitcase.'
Wan Peng said: "Stop looking, there's no suitcase in this world. There are only prostitutes."
Driver said: "Bro, you see, I was right, his girl ran away, he."
Driver's father said: "You're the one who's being impudent."
Driver said: "Hit, hit, hit, hit, hit, hit, who have you offended?"

Wan Peng's father said: 'Him!' 'To offend me is to offend him.' 'Is there any justice in the world, is there any humanity?' 'I haven't screwed up my dad yet and I was screwed by him.' 'Being a father-in-law, calling my daughter-in-law a beast in human clothing.' 'Now I've really become a beast, flying around, running around.'

Shui Xiu sat down on the chair, took out a letter from the pocket of her skirt, and placed it on the table.

Shui Xiu looked at the letter, her eyes full of worry. She frowned, her brows furrowed tightly, and her lips trembled slightly. She stared at the letter, her eyes filled with tears.

Wu Zheng said: "For Shui Xiu, such a pure and kind woman, to bear pressures she shouldn't have to is unfortunate. I should protect her and help her. I should help the honest and simple Feng Yucheng brother. The virtuous and hospitable Shui Xiu, and those simple and kind villagers of Yingtan."
The next morning, Uncle Lao Qing was walking on the road with a shoulder pole when he suddenly heard someone calling out to him. He turned around and saw Shui Xiu coming out of the house.
Uncle Lao Qing said: "Shui Xiu, you are amazing. You reported the matter to Liu Yuhai and it has been accepted by the authorities. You'll see."

movie101_7228950501038293560_2760_2940.text: Shui Xiu pointed to the letter and said: "It's written here."
Shui Xiu took the IOU and said: "Uncle Qing, thank you."
Uncle Qing said: "Ah, no need to thank. Ah, it seems that I, the old village chief, am not useful anymore. From now on, I can only run errands and deliver letters for you guys."
Shui Xiu said: "Uncle Qing, if I, Shui Xiu, have said something unpleasant. Please don't take it to heart, I apologize to you."
Uncle Qing said: "What are you talking about? I should apologize to you. You go ahead, I am leaving."
Shui Xiu said: "Then let me accompany you."
Er Niuzi asked: "Big brother, what happened?"
Er Niuzi said: "Well, an announcement has been issued from above, stating that I violated the environmental protection law and asked me to close the quarry."
Er Niuzi said: "How is this possible? I think this is all caused by Shui Xiu. This is the result of her complaining to the authorities."

Er Niuzi asked: "So how do you fight?"

Liu Yuhai said: "In this way, you go from door to door in the village for me. Just tell them, say that I am certain to win the election for village chief this time. And you have to tell them, tell them that I have already booked 20,000 square meters of slate. As long as everyone participates, everyone will make money. Go on."
Liu Yuhai said: "Ou La."
Feng Yuquan: "Yucheng."
Feng Yuquan called out: "Oh, Sister Mei Feng."
Mei Feng asked: "Where is your Shui Xiu?"
Feng Yuquan said: "She's out, is there something wrong?"
Mei Feng said: "She's out? My husband has been crushed to death, you've been turned into a disabled person. She goes out every day, what is she doing out there?"
Feng Yuquan said: "Sister Mei Feng, don't talk nonsense."

Mei Feng said: "Don't I talk nonsense? Who in the village doesn't know, your Shui Xiu. With that little white face taking photos, she goes out every day, do you know what she is doing? Do you? You are such an idiot."
Feng Yuquan said: "Mei Feng."

movie101_7228950501038293560_2940_3120.text: Yu Cheng said: "My Shui Xiu is not like that at all."

Shui Xiu said: "Your threshold is high." "I won't come in."

Mei Feng said: "You ask me why, it's to let off steam."

Mei Feng said: "I am thinking about the children." "My daughter can't even eat now."

Shui Xiu said: "This, is what Yao Yao and I wrote after visiting other tourist attractions these past few days. With this planning book, we can develop, develop tourism."

Shui Xiu said: "Alright, then let me put it this way, if I, Shui Xiu, have food to eat, then you, Mei Feng, will have food to eat."
Mei Feng said: "Okay, those are your words, I will remember them." After saying that, Mei Feng turned and left, and the crowd started clapping.
