The scene shifts to the village committee, where the villagers are gathered. The village committee secretary says, "After the villagers' election in Yingtan Village, the leadership group supervised the village election. According to the election law, this election was fair. Liu Yuhai was elected chairman of the village committee. Everyone clapped for him."

Liu Yuhai said: "Thank you everyone. I have good news to tell you, can the people at the back hear me? Wang Gan Bu, can you give that to me? I have good news to tell everyone. I just signed a very big order with Boss Wang from Shanghai. They ordered a full 20,000 square meters of stone plates. Folks, 20,000 square meters of stone plates, just for this year, that order will keep us all busy."
Liu Yuhai, with a smile, said: "I, Liu Yuhai, have one principle." "Money isn't everything."

movie101_7228950501038293560_3120_3300.text: Liu Yuhai said: "Having no money is absolutely not an option. I only recognize one word, and that is money."

Liu Yuhai said: "So, here and now, let me make a statement to everyone, I'm going to expand my slate factory to fatten the wallets of more of our fellow villagers. When that time comes, I will help everyone make more money and let our villagers live the life of the wealthy sooner rather than later."
Liu Yuhai said: "My speech is over!"
The host said: "Please welcome Li Shuixiu to speak."

Li Shuixiu said: "Fellow villagers, I, Shuixiu, am not good at speaking. But today, I want to introduce a concept to everyone. That is soil and water conservation and environmental protection. Maybe you all, don't understand the concept I'm talking about, so let me put it another way. We live at the foot of the big mountains, relying on the mountains for our livelihood. It's natural, but if we use up the mountains, what will our descendants rely on? Quarrying slate is profitable, but we all understand its dangers. Moreover, quarrying slate also damages our ecological environment."
Li Shuixiu said: "What you're saying, we also can't understand, right? If we can't understand, then explain it clearly."

Li Shuixiu said: "Then let's talk about tourism. As long as everyone trusts me, Shuixiu, I will lead everyone to vigorously develop our Yingtang's tourism, promote our village far and wide. As long as we can make tourism work, every family in our village could become wealthy."

The scene shifts to a bar, where a man says: "Oh, women these days are too realistic. As long as you have this, they'll throw themselves into your arms. Hey, brother, are you still single now, got a target yet?"
Wu Zhen said: "Did anything develop with the girl you filmed last time?" "You have to seize the moment and not let the duck that's in your hands fly away."
Wu Zhen said: "Alright, alright, you're right, I can't argue with you. Let's talk business, have you looked at the tourism planning proposal I gave you last time?"
The chubby man said: "I've seen it, it's good."
Wu Zhen said: "You want me to invest."
Wu Zhen said: "Nonsense, if I'm not asking you to invest, what am I asking for? Once this tourism project kicks off, a significant amount of funds needs to be invested. What do you think?"
The man in the floral jacket said: "Buddy, let me tell you, I've always wanted to be a miser in my life, not spending a penny, but if you're asking me for a loan, I might consider it."
Er Niuzi said: "Liu Yuhai brother, I..."

movie101_7228950501038293560_3300_3480.text: Er Niuzi said: "I can no longer call you brother, I'll just call you Village Chief Liu."
Er Niuzi asked, "Brother Hai, what's wrong with you?"
Liu Yuhai said: "Lost my voice during the village head election."

Er Niuzi said: "Hey, no matter what, brother, now I'm the biggest in the village, no, you're the biggest. Shui Xiu is sidelined, she’s trying to do tourism, but does she know anything about tourism? Uh, if no one comes, what can she even do?"
Er Niuzi laughed and sat down next to Liu Yuhai, asking, "Do you know what they're up to now?"
Er Niuzi said: "Shui Xiu, Yao Yao, and that pretty-boy photographer, they went to visit some tourist attraction."
Er Niuzi said: "What visit? I think they're just out having fun. I really don't understand what Feng Yucheng is thinking, how can he bear to watch his wife mess around with others every day?"
Er Niuzi, with a face full of grievance, turned to Liu Yuhai and said, "That man of hers, he's just a worthless bum."
The scene shifts, and Er Niuzi is sitting in front of Liu Yuhai, who is lying on the sofa, laughing. Er Niuzi says, "This is your tourism plan."
Shui Xiu said: "Village head Liu, the more detailed parts are later on, please take a look."
Liu Yuhai picked up the glass of water on the table, took a sip, and then put the glass back. He picked up the contract and said, 'No need to look at it.'
Liu Yuhai said: "Shui Xiu, I just want to ask you one thing. Since you want to develop tourism, you need funds, right? Where are you going to get that money?"
Shui Xiu said: "Village head, we've calculated it. Right now, to develop tourism, we don't need that much money. As long as we can get the word out, the tourism will take off."

The village party secretary said: "I understand what you're saying. My principle is still the same: money. If you can make money, I'll support whatever you do. But, look at our village committee, we can't even squeeze out a penny."
The man said: "How about this, if you can get the money, you go ahead. If not, then let's drop the matter."
Shui Xiu said: "Alright, as long as you agree, I'll find a way to get the money."
Liu Yuhai looked at the notice on the wall, then at the ceiling, and muttered to himself, 'Money, you're a bloodless knife.'

movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.text: Wu Zheng's Wife and Yao Yao looked at the package on the table, puzzled. Shui Xiu asked, 'Wu Zheng brother, what is this?'
Wu Zheng said: "This 100,000 yuan is for your travel expenses."
Shui Xiu looked at Wu Zheng with a puzzled face, then turned to Yao Yao and said: "We, how can we use your money."
Wu Zheng said: "Shui Xiu, you see, I have used your portrait rights, you did not charge me for using fee, gave me such a great help, this can be considered as my gratitude."
Shui Xiu looked at Wu Zheng, then at Yao Yao, and said: "Okay, this money, consider that we borrowed it, when we have completed the tourism project, we will pay you back."
Wu Zheng nodded and said, "Good."
Liu Yuhai looked at the two of them and said: "Good job, Shui Xiu, you are talented."
Yao Yao said: "You said when you were running for the village chief that you would make everyone in the village rich."
Liu Yuhai said: "Yes, I did say that. I want everyone to get rich quickly by carving stone slabs, by their own labor."
Shui Xiu asked: "What about our tourism?"
Liu Yuhai said: "I keep my word."

Liu Yuhai said: "Since you have already got the funds, then just go ahead. I just want to see whether everyone is willing to make money by carving stone slabs or relying on your half-baked tourism for a living."

Shui Xiu said: "Today, I convened everyone because I have something to say. As the old saying goes, one depends on the hills when he lives in the hills and relies on the water when living near water. Our place here, with its beautiful mountains and clear waters, and so many ancient villages. Why can't we do easy and profitable tourism business. Today I, Shui Xiu, take the lead in opening up the Zhonghe Hall in the old residence for tourists to visit."

Shui Xiu said: "Everyone, you can participate in our tourism cooperation in the form of equity. Men can be guides and security guards, women can cook. Take out our knitted handicrafts to sell as artworks, sell all the walnuts, chestnuts, and persimmons, and we will all make money."
Shui Xiu asked: "Fellow villagers, do you think it's good?"
The crowd responded: 'Okay.'
Er Niuzi, sitting on a donkey, said: "Shui Xiu sister-in-law, what's so good to see in our broken house? Don't lose so much at that time that we can't even wear pants, right?"

Shui Xiu said: "You, < Er Niuzi >, just rest assured, as long as you enter the valley, not only will you be able to wear suits and shoes, you will also be able to marry a college student from the city."
Er Niuzi said: "Really? Sister-in-law, you can't fool me."
Er Niuzi said: "I'm not lying to you."
Er Niuzi said: "Then I'm in, I will buy shares."
Shui Xiu said: "Well, the method of equity participation is written in detail here. All of you should read it carefully. Yao Yao, you distribute it to everyone."

movie101_7228950501038293560_3660_3840.text: A Villager said: "Does tourism really make money? How much can it give us a year?"
Another Villager said: "Exactly, don't lose all the money we have made."

Yao Yao said: "Listen to me, everyone. It depends on the number of tourists and the size of everyone's income. As long as we have a Phoenix tree here, we are not afraid of not attracting this golden phoenix. What do you guys think?"
Er Niuzi said: "Shui Xiu, if we really lose, and I can't find a wife, I have to go with you."
Shui Xiu said: "Okay, I happen to lack a son."
Er Niuzi, with a smile, looked at the villagers below, then climbed up the signboard of the village committee.
The scene shifts to the village committee office, where Er Niuzi and Wu Zheng are hanging a banner.
The scene shifts to the restaurant's opening ceremony. The host said: "Today our Yingtan small chef's farmhouse restaurant officially opens. Welcome everyone to come and taste!"
The scene shifts to the courtyard, where Er Niuzi is serving food to the villagers. Yao Yao is also busy serving food to the villagers.
Yao Yao said: "Shui Xiu, Wu Zheng is really good, you see tourists say they will come."
Shui Xiu said: "Wu Zheng took beautiful pictures of Yingtan, these tourists want to see how beautiful Yingtan is based on his photos. He really helped our village a lot."
Shui Xiu said: "No, Wu Zheng is really a good man."
The scene shifts to the courtyard, where a group of people are gathered around a table playing mahjong. Yao Yao is wearing an apron and is busy in the kitchen.
Shui Xiu said: "Everyone sit down and rest for a while, Feng Yucheng, come!"
The villagers sat around the table, and Shui Xiu was signing autographs for them.
Yao Yao said: "One day, from catering and tourism, the net earnings are two thousand and eight."
Er Niuzi stood up and said: "Shui Xiu, Shui Xiu, Shui Xiu, we also want to buy shares."
Mei Feng said: "Not possible, not possible. When we asked you to invest, you didn't want to. Now you see that we are making money, you all want to. This is too opportunistic."
Mei Feng said: "Er Niuzi, don't be a toad yawning - it's not like you can bite. Do you hear me? Go away!"
Mei Feng said: "Shui Xiu, I'll listen to you!"
Shui Xiu said: "Mei Feng, as long as you all trust me Shui Xiu, I welcome you to join."
Mei Feng said: "We trust you, let's work sisters!"

movie101_7228950501038293560_3840_4020.text: Liu Yuhai walked over and asked, 'Shan Tao, what's going on? Why are there so few people here?'
Shan Tao said: "I heard that everyone has been going for tourism with Shan Xiu recently. The number of tourists here has been increasing."
Liu Yuhai said: "Tourism, isn't this strange? I, in slab factory, can't compete with tourism?"

Shan Tao said: "Liu Yuhai, don't be disheartened. I have a piece of good news here. The boss from Guangzhou called me this morning and said that he wants to order thirty thousand square meters of slabs at once."

Liu Yuhai said: "Thirty thousand, plus the twenty thousand from the Shanghai boss, that's fifty thousand. Oh no, it's over, it's over, with so few workers, it'll take me until the Year of the Monkey and Month of the Horse to finish, oh my."
Shan Tao said: "But that's true. We have to guarantee the delivery time if we sign a contract with them. Otherwise, they may claim damages. Liu Yuhai, we have to think of a solution."
Liu Yuhai said: "Anyway, I cannot let others enjoy the benefits that should belong to me. I will think of a solution."
Er Niuzi shouted: "Liu Yuhai, Shan Tao."
Shan Tao said: "I have something to do. I'll go over there first."
Liu Yuhai walked up to Er Niuzi and said: "Er Niuzi, long time no see, you are radiant. What have you been doing these days? Don't you know that my slab factory is open?"
Er Niuzi said: "I know, but I'm afraid to ruin it like Feng Yucheng."
Liu Yuhai said: "I'm running a slab factory, not a crematorium. Are you afraid of dying?"
Er Niuzi quickly stopped him: "Liu Yuhai brother, you you you, calm down, calm down, I'm not afraid of death, I just think Shan Xiu's tourism business is very prosperous, really."
Liu Yuhai said: "Stop mentioning 'tourism' to me. I find that word annoying now. Oh boy, you are such a smart aleck, leaving my slab factory and running to Shan Xiu's to curry favor."
Liu Yuhai said: "Disloyal, whoever feeds you is your mother, right?"
Er Niuzi said: "Liu Yuhai, you underestimate me. I was a runner there, aiming to gather their information, didn't I come back to report to you?"
Er Niuzi said: "You see, Shan Xiu receives eight groups of people a day. She makes money hand over fist. Everybody sees that tourism really brings in money."

movie101_7228950501038293560_4020_4200.text: Er Niu said: "Tourism really does make money," 'Who else would come to smash stones?' Liu Yuhai crossed his arms and looked at Er Niu, Er Niu said: "It seems, I really need to think of a strategy, let's discuss this together."
Feng Yucheng, with a cane, walked to the bed, picked up the backpack, and started to pack. He took out a few books from the backpack and placed them on the table.

Feng Yucheng, who was sitting on the bed, heard the noise and immediately got up. He walked to the table, picked up the photo, and looked at it carefully. Feng Yucheng, leaning on a cane, walked to the door, looked at the villagers carrying flags outside, and sighed deeply.

The man in the suit, Liu Yuhai, was also amused by Er Niu's words.

Er Niu said: 'Brother Yucheng, there is ambiguity between those two,' 'the villagers gossip all day,' 'it doesn’t sound good,' 'but then again,' 'who cares as long as it brings you a god of wealth,' 'even if it means wearing a green hat, it's not a loss, right?'

movie101_7228950501038293560_4200_4380.text: Er Niuzi, seeing Feng Yucheng about to leave, quickly stopped him, saying: "Bro, bro bro bro, even, even if I didn't say anything, even if I didn't say, I'm leaving"
Shui Xiu came out of the kitchen with two bowls of food and asked, 'Where is Wu Zheng?'
Shui Xiu put down the bowl and said, "Brother Wu went to the county to attend a photography exhibition."
Feng Yucheng said: "This Wu Zheng, busy with everything, is promoting our village to help us develop tourism" "What is he aiming for?"
Shui Xiu said: "Brother Wu has a good heart."
Feng Yucheng said: "Good heart?" "Give me a break." "What are people outside saying?" He came to our village to develop tourism for you" "He has a purpose."
Shui Xiu asked, 'What purpose?'
Feng Yucheng said: "What purpose? He came for you. No wonder people outside say you are attractive. You should manage your feelings."

Shui Xiu said: "Feng Yucheng, why do you think so? What do you think of me and Brother Wu? I know, I haven't been taking good care of you while I was outside. But me, Shui Xiu, have not done anything sorry to you."
Feng Yucheng said: "Whether you did it or not, you know it in your heart"
Shui Xiu said: "Feng Yucheng, others can say that, but you can't, you know me best, I'm not as dirty as you think."
Feng Yucheng said: "Shameless."

Shui Xiu, with a face full of worry, covered her face with her hands, then stood up and walked out of the room. She opened the door and saw the rain pouring down outside. She quickly ran out with an umbrella.
The bowls and chopsticks on the table were knocked over, and the floor was full of broken plates and bowls.
Feng Yucheng looked up at the portrait on the wall, which was a photo of himself and his wife. He stared at the photo for a long time, then suddenly let out a scream.
Shui Xiu, who was washing clothes, heard the noise and immediately ran out of the house, looking around.
Shui Xiu, with a face full of worry, looked at the two people in front of her, her eyes full of reluctance. She touched her face, her eyes brimming with tears.
Feng Yucheng shouted: "Xiu'er!" "Xiu'er!"
Feng Yucheng went out to find Shui Xiu, shouting, "Xiu'er, Xiu'er, Xiu'er."
Feng Yucheng shouted, "Xiu'er, Xiu'er!"
Feng Yucheng, who was sweeping the yard, heard the sound of water and called out, 'Shui Xiu.'

movie101_7228950501038293560_420_600.text: The scene shifts to the yard, where Old Man is sitting at the table, and Girl comes out with a bowl of food.
Girl said: "Dad, I've heard many people in the village talking, saying that Brother Yucheng and Shui Xiu are in a particularly pitiful situation. Please help them."

Old Man said: "What do you know? More than half of the people in our village work at Liu Yuhai's slate factory to earn a living. If you push him too hard and he shuts down the factory, how will everyone survive? Besides, Liu Yuhai isn't refusing to compensate, it's just that Shui Xiu insists on him taking full responsibility." "Yaoyao, think about it. Shui Xiu's family has no children, which means Liu Yuhai would have to support him in his old age. Isn't that a bit too much?"
Girl said: "What's so excessive about that? I think Shui Xiu is right. If he got hurt, Liu Yuhai should take responsibility."
Girl asked: "Is Uncle Lao Qing at home?"
Girl stood up and said: "Sister-in-law."
Shui Xiu asked: "Are you eating?"
Girl said: 'Okay, do it, over here.' Girl pulled Shui Xiu to sit down.
Shui Xiu took out a medical certificate and said: "This is Yucheng's medical certificate. The doctor says he still needs further treatment."
Old Man said: "Shui Xiu, haven't we settled the medical bills already? I think you've done enough."
Shui Xiu said: "Uncle Lao Qing, I've already approached him several times and he just doesn't care."
Old Man said: "Shui Xiu, we're all neighbors. Don't overdo it."
Shui Xiu said: "What if Yucheng ends up disabled? Who will take care of him for the rest of his life?"
Old Man said: "Who will take care of him? The village will."
Shui Xiu said: "He's my husband, not the village's responsibility. I can take care of him myself."
Old Man said: "Aren't you being unreasonable?"

Shui Xiu said: "How am I being unreasonable? I just want him to take responsibility. Why can't he?" "Uncle Lao Qing, you're the village head. I came to you to hear a fair word." "If you won't handle this, I'll go to the township. I can't believe this can't be resolved."
Old Man said: "Go, go ahead."
Girl stood up and said: "Sister-in-law, Dad, why do you talk like that?"
Girl ran out and shouted: 'Sister-in-law.'
Old Man said: "How am I talking? Is she arguing with me now?" The night fell, and the village was quiet.
Shui Xiu was busy in the kitchen, scooping soup into a bowl, when she heard the sound of a door closing. She turned around and walked out of the kitchen, heading towards the door.

movie101_7228950501038293560_4380_4560.text: Feng Yucheng shouted: "Shui Xiu" "Shui Xiu" "Shui Xiu" "Shui Xiu"
Feng Yucheng ran out of the house, shouting, 'Shui Xiu, Shui Xiu, Shui Xiu.'
Feng Yucheng shouted: "Shui Xiu, Shui Xiu, Shui Xiu, Shui Xiu."
Feng Yucheng shouted: "Shui Xiu" "Shui Xiu" "Shui Xiu" "Shui Xiu"
Shui Xiu, with tears streaming down her face, turned and ran out of the room. She ran through the dimly lit alley, her figure gradually disappearing from sight.
Shui Xiu ran into the house, only to find it in a mess, with broken plates and bowls all over the floor, and the table and chairs knocked over.
Shui Xiu walked into the room, and the photo of her and her husband on the wall suddenly caught her attention.
Shui Xiu, with a face full of worry, watched as Feng Yucheng left the house. She stood there, not knowing what to do, her mind racing with thoughts.
Shui Xiu shouted: "Feng Yucheng!" "Feng Yucheng!"
Feng Yucheng ran out of the house and asked, 'What's wrong?'
Shui Xiu said: "Big brother Wu Zheng, Feng Yucheng is missing."
Feng Yucheng asked, 'What happened?'
Shui Xiu said, 'I was arguing with him, and he smashed up the place.'
Shui Xiu said, 'Ah, shouldn't we go look for him?'
Feng Yucheng and Shui Xiu ran out of the house, with Wu Zheng closely following them.
Shui Xiu shouted: "Feng Yucheng" "Feng Yucheng" "Feng Yucheng" "Feng Yucheng" "Feng Yucheng"
Shui Xiu said: "Doctor!"
Feng Yucheng said, 'Shui Xiu, you go ahead and look for people.'
Shui Xiu said: "Got a hold of it."
Wu Zheng shouted: "Doctor, doctor!"
The scene shifts, and the man in the suit says to Er Niuzi, 'Er Niuzi, well done.'

movie101_7228950501038293560_4560_4740.text: The leader patted Er Niuzi's shoulder and said, "You need to inform the villagers about a meeting at the village committee tomorrow."
Shui Xiu, who was sleeping beside him, was awakened by his call. She looked at Feng Yucheng and said, "You're awake!"
Feng Yucheng said: "Shui Xiu, you shouldn't have saved me."
Feng Yucheng, with a vacant stare, slowly opened his mouth and said, "I'm a useless man."
Shui Xiu said: "What are you talking about?" "You're my man, without you, wouldn't my life be aimless? Our good days are just beginning."
Feng Yucheng said: "There's a lot of things I can't help you with and seeing you with Wu Zheng every day, it bothers me inside!"
Shui Xiu said: "Feng Yucheng, my relationship with Brother Wu is not what you think."
Feng Yucheng said: "Actually, I trust that you are not like that, but this Wu Zheng, he came to our village for you."

movie101_7235213933035192887_2040_2220.text: Zhang Dong said: "So, can the two of you try to understand each other a bit?"

movie101_7235213933035192887_2220_2400.text: Zhang Xi said, "You were still raised by me. You're siding with outsiders, eh? Your mother has gone on a trip to Hong Kong. Wait until she comes back to see how she deals with you."

movie101_7235213933035192887_2400_2580.text: Zhang Xi said: "We know what's going on, right?"

movie101_7235213933035192887_2760_2940.text: Zhang Dong walked out of the house, took off his sunglasses, and looked at the villagers sitting below the stage.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2940_3120.text: Zhang Dong said: "A healthy and happy life, thank you everyone."

The scene shifts to the village committee, where a woman says: "Next, let's invite our last candidate, Lin Chunhu, to take the stage and speak."
Lin Chunhu walked into the village committee, greeted the villagers, and then sat down.
Lin Chunhu said: "My name is Lin Chunhu. I'm a straightforward person and don’t usually talk about grand principles. To be honest, I made some money from running a turtle farming cooperative."

Lin Chunhu said: "Regarding this election for village official, the villagers have different opinions. Some think that my running for village head has ulterior motives, but I am clear in my conscience."

Lin Chunhu said: "Some people advised me not to take on this thankless tough job. But in my heart, I truly want to do something concrete for the villagers. I believe I can shoulder the responsibility everyone trusts me with."
Lin Chunhu said: "If I am elected this time, I will definitely not let down the expectations of the entire village. I will fulfill my promises in the next three years."

Even those at home with children or the elderly lacking the ability to work can join in. I will provide the technology for free and help everyone expand sales channels. Then, I will distribute salaries to everyone."

Lin Chunhu continued: "Second, near our village at the foot of Phoenix Mountain, I plan to develop a seedling market, so villagers won't have to get up early and walk dozens of miles to sell seedlings anymore."
Lin Chunhu said: "During my three-year term, I want to turn the seedling market into the largest seedling trading market in our city. How does that sound?"
The crowd below the stage applauded and said: "Good, good, finally someone who does tangible work, yes, exactly, yes, exactly, good."

Lin Chunhu continued: "Third, I think there is something very important, which is the ecological construction of our village. I promise that within my three-year term, I will tackle the pollution sources upstream of the river and make our mother river clean and bright."

movie101_7235213933035192887_3120_3300.text: Lu Chunhu said: "My speech is over, please vote for me."

Zhang Dong's Younger Brother said: "It was just a coincidence that I saw him give He Dame the turtle. If I hadn't seen it, who knows how many others he might have given turtles to."
Zhang Xi said: "Alright, whether it's a coincidence or not, the facts are right here. Mayor Yang, if a candidate is really bribing voters..."

movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.text: Zhang Xi asked: "How should we deal with this?"
Town Mayor said: "If this really happened, we will investigate thoroughly."

Lin Chunhu asked: "Do you know Aunt He is a party member?"
Lin Chunhu said: "I know she is a party member!"

Lin Chunhu said: "No."

Lin Chunhu said: "I had no motive, I just heard Aunt He was not in good health recently, and she was all by herself, so I felt sorry for her. I sent a home-raised tortoise, just to give her some strength."

Lin Chunhu said: "I was born in Camellia Village and grew in Camellia Village. I always want to do more for the villagers of Camellia Village. I won't say anything else. I, Lin Chunhu, have a clear conscience."

Genxing's Dad said: "Their names are all here. Actually, every New Year and holiday, all the elders over seventy in our village receive a consolation gift from Lin Chunhu."

movie101_7235213933035192887_3480_3660.text: The Old Man said: "Yes, Mayor Yang, this is not a bribery election at all. You must investigate him thoroughly and return Lin Chunhu's innocence, okay?"

Bao Liang said: "You see, the elected committee members, the old secretary is old, Liu Mengting is just a freshman out of school, she has no experience. Lin Chunhu’s eligibility has been cancelled. Now, in terms of strength and qualifications, this secretary position can't be given to others."
The man next to him said: "Yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, well said."

Zhang Dong said: "Okay, to be honest, I didn't want to be it initially. Being a village official is not a great job. Being a village chief is annoying enough for me. However, since everyone trusts me so much and the village can't find a suitable candidate for the time being, I'll reluctantly go along with the public opinion."
Zhang Dong said: "I'll drink with you." "Cheers."
Zhang Dong said: "Speaking of this election, it not only has people's will, but also the will of heaven."
Zhang Dong said: "Yes, who allowed our Xiaobao to take such a nice photo, it's simply a divine favor."
The man next to him said: "Yes, yes, yes, Xiaobao is the number one hero." "Bao Liang brother, I toast to you."
Bao Liang said: "Ah, by the way, why didn't we call Xiaobao for a couple of drinks?"
Bao Liang said: "Xiaobao must not be called, he is kept in the dark about this matter."
The scene shifts to a bamboo forest, where Zhang Dong is shouting: "Mengting, Mengting, Mengting."

movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.text: Zhang Xiaobao said: "What did I do to offend you this time? I've already advised my dad about the pig farm issue." "He promised he would change."
Liu Mengting took out a photo and said, "See for yourself."
Zhang Xiaobao took the photos and said, "What are these? Ah, aren't these the photos I took last time we went to Aunt He’s house together? What's going on?"

Liu Mengting said: "Shouldn't I be asking you that?" "Only you, me, and Brother Chunhu were there that day." "How did this photo get out?" "Do you know Brother Chunhu was falsely accused of bribery because of this photo?"
Liu Mengting said: "Tell me." "Wasn't this done by your dad colluding with your family members?"
Zhang Xiaobao said, "I really don't know anything about this."
Liu Mengting said: "This is your camera." "If you don’t know, then who does?"
Zhang Xiaobao turned his head to look at Liu Mengting, then turned back to look at the road they had come from, and said, "You think I was involved in this, don't you?"
Liu Mengting said: "Zhang Xiaobao, I used to think you were different from those people. But now, I am really disappointed in you, you know that?"

Zhang Xiaobao said: "Even though the camera is mine, many people have had access to it." "And many people have borrowed it." "Forget it, I won't explain anymore." "Mengting, we've known each other for so many years." "I thought you would at least have some basic trust in me." "Now I see, I overestimated myself."
Liu Mengting watched Zhang Xiaobao's retreating figure, her eyes filled with tears.
Zhang Baoliang looked at the fish tank, then at the fish in it, and finally at the goldfish in his hand.

Zhang Xiaobao came down the stairs and asked, "Dad, have you seen my camera?" Zhang Baoliang was still admiring the goldfish tank. Zhang Xiaobao asked, "Camera? It's almost dark. Are you still going out to take pictures?"
Zhang Xiaobao said, "Have you seen it? I’m in a hurry. Have you seen my camera or not?"
Zhang Baoliang said, "No, just don’t go out."
Zhang Xiaobao pointed at Zhang Baoliang and said, "Did you hide my camera?"
Zhang Xiaobao pointed at Zhang Baoliang and said: "Yes, I took it."
Zhang Xiaobao said: "Give it back to me."
Zhang Baoliang said: "You did this, didn’t you?" "You used the photos in my camera." "You didn't want Brother Chunhu to become the secretary, right?"

Zhang Baoliang said: "If he becomes the secretary, our family wouldn’t have peaceful days." "Didn’t you hear him say in his campaign speech that he wants to manage the Mother River?" "Isn’t that targeting our family?" "If he does that, how will our pig farm survive?"
Zhang Xiaobao angrily said, "Just because of this, you mixed with those people from East Zhang Baoliang?" "Doing such conscience-defying things?"
Zhang Baoliang said: "I'm doing this for survival."

movie101_7235213933035192887_3840_4020.text: Bao Liang said: "You know about the great pig farm in the village. Why is it leased to our family every year? They willingly give us such a good place because over the years I've been treating them well, providing them with good food and drinks, and offering fine tobacco. Ah, if you still recognize me as your father, go back to your room obediently."
Bao Liang said: "Son, you have to understand, I do this for the sake of our family. As long as we father and son are united, we can raise more pigs and make more money."
Xiao Bao said: "Stop it, I don't want so much money. What I want is a clear conscience. To be human, one must have a conscience. Without it, we're worse than pigs."
Bao Liang cursed: "Bastard! How dare you talk to me like this? It was me, your father who's worse than a pig, who raised you. Spoiled piglet, if you've got the guts, then leave!"
Bao Liang said: 'Take the camera, here.'
Bao Liang, seeing Xiao Bao about to leave, shouted: "Come back! If you dare leave through that door, never come back!"
Xiao Bao, who was originally sitting in the audience, suddenly stood up and walked out of the auditorium.

The scene shifts to the village committee office, where Mayor Yang is having a meeting with a villager. The villager asked: "Sister, how does Lin Chunhu behave usually in the village? Is he good to people?"
Mayor Yang said: "He's very good, especially kind to the elderly."
Mayor Yang said: "Oh, uh, then does he have anything to do with this election?"
Xiao Bao shouted: "Town leader, town leader!"
Mayor Yang asked: "Hey, what's the matter, young man?"
Xiao Bao said: "Town leader! I'm actually here to clarify something. Lin Chunhu didn't rig the election. The photo, it was actually... I took it, you see."

Mayor Yang said: "Everyone, please be quiet. I've called you all here because there is a very important matter I need to announce to you all. Everyone has been very concerned about the bribery case in our village's election. Over these past few days, our township investigation team has conducted a comprehensive investigation into this matter, and now, the results are out."

Mayor Yang said: "After verification from various aspects, Lin Chunhu has not engaged in any election bribery. Therefore, the results of our election still stand. Also, during the two recommendations and one election process, Lin Chunhu received the highest call from both party members and the masses."
Mayor Yang said: "After the decision of our superior party organization, it has been confirmed that he is the candidate for the new Village Party Branch Secretary of Teahua Village."

movie101_7235213933035192887_4020_4200.text: The crowd below the stage applauded and said: "Good, really good."

Mayor Yang said: "Good, everyone be quiet, I have a very important matter, to announce to everyone, after verification through public reporting, one of the candidates, Zhang Dong, has engaged in election bribery. The bribery is very clear, and the evidence is also conclusive. So our township party committee has decided to revoke his eligibility as a committee member. In this term's election, he will not participate. Even if elected, it would be invalid."
The man in the floral shirt stood up and said: "Exactly, exactly, exactly."
Younger Brother asked: "Big brother, where are we going?"
Younger Brother said: "Big brother, about this, I know we messed it up, I didn't realize they took something, and couldn't keep their mouths shut."
Younger Brother said: "Get out, get out"
Younger Brother said: "Big brother."
Younger Brother said: "Scram"
Younger Brother said: "Alright alright alright, I'll scram I'll scram." Younger Brother got out of the car.
Zhang Dong said: "Close the door"
Zhang Dong said: 'I'm not a thing.'
Zhang Dong said: "A bunch of useless people"
Younger Brother shouted: "Big brother, big brother!" Zhang Dong ignored Younger Brother and drove away.
Zhang Dong got out of the car, closed the door, and started to wipe the car body with a cloth.
The scene shifts to the village committee office, where the village committee is holding a meeting.

Meng Ting said: "Now, our farmers' lives are better, but our rural domestic sewage has become an important source of water pollution. So, our village organization has decided to try using ecological treatment to deal with our village's domestic sewage."
A woman in the audience asked: "Hey, Xiao Liu, what is ecological treatment? We don't understand, can you explain it to us?"

Meng Ting said: 'Okay, this ecological treatment refers to,' 'after collecting and settling the sewage,' 'to build constructed wetlands,' 'through the joint action of wetland plants, organic substrates, and microorganisms,' 'and through multi-layer filtration,' 'degrade pollutants,' 'purify water quality and discharge rationally,' 'this method of sewage treatment is itself quite low-carbon and environmentally friendly,' 'plus the investment cost for individual projects is low,' 'it's a purely ecological treatment approach.'
Woman in Red Clothes said: "Sewage treatment tanks, aren't those things found in cities?"
Woman in Red Clothes said: "Exactly, building a sewage pool at our doorstep, that would smell terrible."
Meng Ting said: "Yeah."
Meng Ting said: 'Everyone, take a look. This is a model of a constructed wetland from the next village. This afternoon, you can all follow me for a visit, and once you see it, you'll understand.'

movie101_7235213933035192887_420_600.text: Chun Hu said: "What is going on here"
Eldest Brother said: "Chun Hu, take a look" Chun Hu took the paper from Eldest Brother's hand, and everyone looked at him.

The letter read: 'For the convenience of managing our household and establishing a business, my brother and I have voluntarily decided to divide our household. Eldest brother, Lin Genwang, will support our father, and second brother, Lin Genxing, will support our mother. Both will look after their respective parents, provide for their every need till the end, bear clear responsibilities, and not interfere in each other's affairs. To ensure there is proof of this arrangement, we're putting this in writing as a testament.'
Second Brother said: "This is all what we agreed upon back then, written in black and white"
Mother said: "The two of us elders, each living in a different house, if one of us falls ill in the middle of the night, no one would even know, let alone take care of us."
Second Brother said: "My old man and I want to chat and speak our minds, but we have to do it behind their backs, it feels like being thieves."
Mother said: "This, both of us living separately, my legs are not good. Last night, I got up to get some water and fell. When my old wife found out," "she wanted to move in to take care of me"
Mother said: "But Eldest Brother adamantly refused. He said if she moved in, the two brothers would no longer look after us."
Chun Hu said: 'Living together is no big deal.'

Second Brother said: "Of course not" "My dad's health is poor" "My mom just had surgery last year" "If both of them live in my house" "Food, drinks, medical expenses, all would be on me alone. How can I afford it? And he wouldn't help."
Second Brother said: 'What, I don't help? Who paid the twenty thousand yuan hospital fee for mom's surgery last year?'

Chun Hu said: "Stop arguing, aren't you ashamed? This is about supporting your parents, not contracting a turtle pond. Genwang, Genxing, I initially agreed to let you join our turtle farming cooperative, but now, I need to reconsider."

Chun Hu said: "If you don't support your parents, it means you have no character. And people without character are not welcome in our cooperative. When we'll allow you to join depends on your future conduct, understood?"
Old Father and Mother looked at Chun Hu with pleading eyes, and Old Father said: "Chun Hu, in the future, can my old wife and I still live together?"

Chun Hu said: "Don't worry" "This agreement is not valid" "There are laws in the country" "Just because you signed an agreement to separately support each parent" "doesn't mean you only take care of your own" "If you don't look after them," "it constitutes the crime of abandonment." "Even if you take it to court," "the judge will likely side with me." "Alright," "regarding the issue of supporting parents," "don't just think about how much money you are spending."

movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.text: Man said: "Think about the old man's wishes, take good care of the old man's health, that's settled then, the two old men will live together, as for the support payments, the two brothers will split them equally."
The scene shifts to the next day, a small cow is standing in the yard, with a big cow behind it.
Old Secretary and Mayor Yang shook hands and greeted each other, Old Secretary said: "Oh, Mayor Yang, hello, hello, hello"
Mayor Yang said: "I heard your blood pressure has been a bit high recently. You really need to take care of yourself."
Old Secretary said: "It's a minor issue, no big deal, no big deal."
Mayor Yang said: "Please, please, please, come on in."
Man in Gray Clothes said: "Please, please, I've come today, mainly to prepare for the re-election of our Camellia Village Party organization, to get a sense of things."
Man in Gray Clothes asked: "Mayor Yang, are there any new policies for this year's election?"

Mayor Yang said: "This year's village Party organization election is not just the business of the Party members. We're implementing a system of two nominations and one election. Candidates are nominated by both Party members and the public. The entire village can participate."
Man in Gray Clothes said: "What if some people are away all year, working or doing business and can't come back, how can they be recommended then?"
Mayor Yang said: "Public recommendation cannot be delegated," "We will try our best to inform them," "Those who can come back should come back," "Those who can't," "will have to forgo this right"
Man in Gray Clothes said: "Alright Mayor Yang, let's sit inside."
Mayor Yang said: "Alright, alright, let's go" "Please, please, please"
Woman in White Clothes said: "From what you're saying, my Xian Gen isn't a Party member, so he has no chance of becoming the village Party secretary?"
Woman in Black Clothes said: "Your Xian Gen, even if he were a Party member, he still wouldn't stand a chance."
Woman in White Clothes asked: "Why?"

Woman in Black Clothes said: "I'm not joking, hey, look here, the problem with your illegal house construction last year for the wedding, that's no small matter, so even if your Xian Gen were elected, he would be removed from office."
Seated Woman said: "Is it that serious?"

Woman in Black Clothes said: "Of course, anyone who was released from prison less than five years ago, violated family planning policies, or didn't fulfill their duties for a long time, is disqualified."

Woman in White Clothes said: "Hey, if you count it this way, there aren't many qualified people in our village. My Fang Sheng is one. But on the other hand, our nursery business has been growing, he doesn't even have time to catch a breath. Even if he were elected, he wouldn't care."
Woman in Black Clothes said: "Oh, you're boasting"
The scene shifts to the village entrance, where a man in a red shirt is running towards the village. He shouts: "Xiao Bao, hurry up"
Man in Gray Clothes said: "Alright, got it"
The man asked: "Is it heavy?"
Man in Gray Clothes said: "Not heavy"
Man in Gray Clothes said: "If it's not heavy, then move faster"
Man in Gray Clothes: "I'm catching up"

movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.text: The scene shifts to a winding mountain road, where a red car is driving along. The car has a license plate that reads 'Chongqing Chongqing'. The car is a Land Rover, and the person driving is wearing sunglasses and a baseball cap.
The scene shifts to the winding mountain road, where a car is slowly driving. The car stops at the entrance of the village, and the man in the passenger seat gets out and walks into the village.
The scene shifts to a car driving on a mountain road, with the words 'Election at the Village Committee' appearing on the screen.

The car stopped in front of the village committee office, and the people around said, "Here he comes," "Big brother, big brother," "Watch your step, be careful," "Slow down, big brother," "Slow down," "You're finally back big brother," "Let's go, big brother," "You seem very energetic," "Let's go, let's go," "Watch your step."
The scene shifts to a tea house, where a group of middle-aged women are gathered around a table. One of them asks, "Who is this rich man?"
The woman said, 'Oh, that’s our village chief Zhang Dong. You don’t recognize him?'
The woman said, "She's only been married a few months. The Village Chief spends most of his time in Jiangxi. Of course, she wouldn't recognize him."

The woman said: "If you talk about our village, his family has the most brothers. I remember when they were little, all five of them would gang up in a fight. Everyone was afraid of them. They are very influential now."
The woman said: "The oldest Zhang Dong is the village chief, he doesn’t manage the village affairs and spends most of his time in Jiangxi doing nursery business."
The woman said, 'The second brother, Zhang Xi, is a contractor. Remember the road repair we had in our village? It was contracted to him.'
The woman said, "The third brother, Zhang Nan, is the security director of the village. He owes so much money to the small store that he could write a book about it."
The woman said, 'The fourth brother, Zhang Bei, is the factory director of the flour mill. The fifth brother, Zhang Zhong, is a big local ruffian in the village.'
The woman said: "East, West, South, North, Central, isn't this a full mahjong hand?"
The woman said: "Let me tell you, do you know why he came back from Jiangxi at this time?"
The auntie asked, 'Why?'
The woman said: "For Secretary selection."
The woman said: "Oh, that makes sense."
The scene shifts to the inn, where a group of people are walking towards the inn.
The scene shifts to the hotel, where the four brothers are walking out of the room. The leader says, "Come come come. Zhang Dong, big brother, you must be tired from this trip."
Zhang Dong asked: "Anything happened in the village during the half-year I was away?"
The man in the floral shirt said, "Brother, these are the materials prepared by the brothers. Come, have a look. Sit down."
The man said: "Brother, our cousin Zhang Baoliang has now surpassed the Sapium Wood King Zhang Baotang and has become the new richest man in our village."

The man in the floral shirt said: "The assistant village chief Liu Mengting has organized some kind of environmental volunteer team. It seems that she has some big opinions about the water quality of the Da Xi River outside our village."
Zhang Dong said: "Just a bunch of kids messing around."
The man said, "Big brother."

movie101_7235213933035192887_780_960.text: Zhang Xiaobao said: "Liu Mengting, this place has a beautiful view, how about I take a photo for you?"
Zhang Xiaobao said, 'Good, sit here, sit, sit well, one, two, three, hmm, looks good.'
Zhang Xiaobao said: "Liu Mengting, didn’t you just go into town a couple of days ago? Why are you heading to the city again?"

Liu Mengting said: "Old Lady He is almost out of medicine, Uncle Lin needs to get a senior's card, his daughter needs to apply for a birth permit, and then there's Old Lady Song, who wants me to bring a jar of pickles to her son in the city. Ah, I'm too busy to keep up."
Zhang Xiaobao said: "Village assistant, I think you're just a runner and jack of all trades."
Liu Mengting said: "Nonsense, what I do is all about serving our villagers, unlike you, all talk no action."
Zhang Xiaobao said: "How have I been all talk no action?"
Liu Mengting said: "You’ve been talking about organizing a beautiful countryside photography exhibition for a while now, but there's been no movement on it yet."
Zhang Xiaobao said: "Who says? The photos are all ready, look. Not bad, right? Now, my dad is helping me find a venue, as soon as the venue is secured, the exhibition will start."
Liu Mengting said: "Your dad, your dad, your dad, always bringing up your dad, when will you manage to do something on your own?"
Liu Mengting, with a sense of urgency, stepped onto the rocks and ran forward, while Zhang Xiaobao, with a resigned look, watched her leave.
Zhang Xiaobao said: "Liu Mengting, you’re always so busy, do you have any plans for the future?"

Liu Mengting said: "Well, my plan is to manage our village's water environment well, make our village a national ecological demonstration village, and then, protect our village's ancient buildings, and also, to develop our village's cultural tourism resources heavily, then let people from all over the country come visit our village."
Zhang Xiaobao asked, "And then?"
Liu Mengting said: "And then, if I get the chance, I would like to go back to school to continue studying my major."
Zhang Xiaobao said: "Still studying, huh? You’ll be an old maid by the time you're done, then how will you marry me?"
Liu Mengting said: "Stop it."

Zhang Xiaobao said: "Hey, Liu Mengting, actually I have my plans too. You know, my dad just bought me a car recently, right? He said he's going to buy me a house too." " Seeing as we’re both not so young anymore, shouldn’t we..."

Zhang Xiaobao said, 'Hey, why are you walking so slow? Old Lady He is waiting for us at home, let's move faster.' The two walked through the tea garden and into the village. Liu Mengting's father was sitting at the door of his house, waiting for them.

The next morning, Liu Mengting was busy in the kitchen. She scooped a spoonful of salt into the clay pot, then picked up a handful of white flour and poured it in. After that, she took out a small bowl and added some white sugar to it.

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: Liu Mengting went to the kitchen, took out some medicine, and said to Auntie He, "Auntie He, this is the newly bought medicine. It's more effective than the last one. You need to take it once a day. Don't forget."
Liu Mengting said, 'Okay, I got it!'
Zhang Xiaobao was taking photos of Liu Mengting and Auntie He, and Chun Hu happened to walk in. Zhang Xiaobao said, 'Hey, Chun Hu bro, what a coincidence, you're here too.'
Zhang Xiaobao said: "Yes, Auntie He hasn't been well, so I brought a turtle I raised myself to help Auntie He regain strength."
Zhang Xiaobao said: "Ah, alright."
Liu Mengting said, 'Chun Hu bro, please have a seat!'
Liu Mengting said: "Alright, alright, Auntie He."
Chun Hu: 'Yes.'
Chun Hu said: "Look, this turtle is so fresh! Auntie He, are you feeling any better?"
Chun Hu said, "Much better!"
Chun Hu said: "That's good to hear, it's great that you're recovering!"

Auntie He said, 'Thank you, Chun Hu, you're such a good person. You never forget us old folks, even during holidays you give us red envelopes. Over the past few years, I can't even count how many turtles I've received from you.'

The scene shifts to the village committee, where the notice for the Camellia Village Party Organization election is posted. The notice reads: 'According to the requirements of the higher-level party organization, our village will elect the next committee members of the Party Organization.'
Bao Liang, with a pig's head mask on, sat down and said: "Bao Liang ah."
Bao Liang: "Hey, hey, hey."
Bao Liang said: "You didn't need to bring a gift when you came. Why are you being so polite?"
Bao Liang said: "Director, this is the pig face we cured ourselves at home. You can't find this kind of stuff in Jiangxi."
Bao Liang: "Old Five."
Bao Liang: 'Oh.'
Bao Liang said: "Take it to the kitchen and prepare it well. Let's have it for lunch."
Bao Liang: "Okay."
Director said: "Prepare a good bottle of wine, so I can have a drink with Bao Liang."
Bao Liang clapped and said: "Alright alright alright."
Director said: "Ah, Bao Liang."
Director said: "Hey."
Director asked, "How's business in the first half of the year?"
Bao Liang said: "Not too great, business is tough these days."
Director said: "You're being humble, aren't you? You've always been the richest person in our village."
Bao Liang said: "Oh, richest in the village? I'm barely scraping by. For instance, I wanted to expand my pig farm."
Director said: "That's a good thing!"

Bao Liang said: "But dealing with the land isn't easy. The two households living there refuse to move no matter what, causing a big fuss. Today, I'm hoping you, Director, can put in a good word and help my cousin out."
Director said: "Bao Liang ah."
Director said: "Oh."
Director said: "This timing isn't right."
Director said: "Ah?"
Director said: "We're in the middle of the village organization election, and since you're my cousin, if I speak up for you"
Director said: "Those with ulterior motives will accuse me of favoritism."
Bao Liang said: "Hey, in our village, with the surname Zhang, going back three generations, aren't we all relatives? Are you really afraid of that?"
Bao Liang asked, 'Do you have some sort of leverage that they're holding against you?'
Bao Liang said: "Leverage? How could that be? My pig farm has all the proper paperwork."
